adj. 公平的；美丽的，白皙的；[气象] 晴朗的 adv. 公平地；直接地；清楚地 vi. 转晴 n. 展览会；市集；美人 同义词:beautiful, fine, clear, just, impartial, definitely, directly, equally, immediately, straight, expo, exhibition, beauty " I am living proof this election is not free and fair , " he says , " if it was I would still be publishing ".“这次选举不是自由和公正的，我是活的证据”，他说，“如果它是的话，我应该仍然在发行报纸”。
n. 假货；骗子；[体]假动作 vt. 捏造；假装…的样子 vi. 假装；[体]做假动作 adj. 伪造的 He was arrested for faking some famous paintings.他由于伪造一些名画而被捕。
vi. 落下；变成；来临；减弱 n. 下降；秋天；瀑布 vt. 砍倒；击倒 adj. 秋天的 同义词:become, come, lower, reduction, decline, autumn, floor, cut sth down, autumn Apples fell from the tree.苹果从树上落下。
adj. 奇异的；空想的；极好的；不可思议的 n. 古怪的人 同义词:wonderful, excellent, famous, super, great, weirdo, geezer Write a short passage about your fantastic experience .写一篇小短文，关于你的奇妙的经历。
vt. 使着迷，使神魂颠倒 vi. 入迷 同义词:enthrall, beguile, be carried away The children were fascinated by the toys in the big department store.孩子们被大商场里的玩具迷住了。
n. 扣件；钮扣；按钮；使系牢之物 同义词:button, pushbutton Who invented the zip fastener ?是谁发明的拉链?。
adj. 完美的；无缺点的 同义词:perfect, ideal, full, indefective In Mrs. Dashwood 's estimation he was as faultless as in Marianne 's .达什伍德太太同玛丽安一样，也认为他是完美无缺的。
adj. 无畏的；大胆的 同义词:bold, audacious But more than anything, Iverson is tough , and fearless .不过最重要的是，艾佛逊很强悍，而且一无所惧。
vt. 感觉；认为；触摸；试探 vi. 觉得；摸索 n. 感觉；触摸 同义词:expect, count, guess, find, make, fish for, poke about, consciousness, sense perception Can you tell what this is by feeling it?你能摸出这是什么东西吗?
adj. 凶猛的；毁灭性的 vt. 砍伐；打倒；击倒 n. [林] 一季所伐的木材；折缝；兽皮 v. 掉下；摔倒；下垂；变坏（fall的过去式） 同义词:fierce, destructive, floor, down with, hide, dropped to fell an opponent with a blow一拳把对手击倒
n. 友谊；奖学金；研究员职位 同义词:friendship, scholarship Even after receiving the "right hand of fellowship , " Sunday school bored me .即使是在获得了“准许入伙”之后，主日学报还是使我感到枯燥无味。
adj. 女性的；妇女（似）的；阴性的；娇柔的 同义词:female, negative There is also something glamorous and feminine about it .还有一些关于它迷人的女性的东西。
n. 栅栏；围墙；剑术 vt. 防护；用篱笆围住；练习剑术 vi. 击剑；搪塞；围以栅栏；跳过栅栏 同义词:bounding wall, perimeter wall, defend, forefend, prevaricate, tergiversate His land is fenced with barbed wire.他的地用带钩的铁丝围起来。
adj. [化学] 亚铁的；铁的，含铁的 同义词:iron Ferrous metals , timber , and pulp seem to offer the main field of reduction .看来，黑色金属、木材和纸浆是削减的重要对象。
n. 渡船；摆渡；渡口 vt. （乘渡船）渡过；用渡船运送；空运 vi. 摆渡；来往行驶 同义词:lift, cross, wing to ferry people across a river渡人过河
adj. 富饶的，肥沃的；能生育的 n. 肥沃，多产 同义词:rich, viable, pregnancy, enrichment Fertile lands in some states could be mistaken for lakes .有些州肥沃的土地可能会误变成湖泊。
n. 战士，斗争者；斗士；奋斗者；好战者 同义词:champion, warrior A clever fighter exerts both strength and skill .一个灵巧的拳击者兼用力量与技巧。
n. 灯丝；细丝；细线；单纤维 同义词:hairline rule, leptonema Textured yarns are composed primarily of filament fibers .变形纱主要由长丝纤维构成。
vt. 装满，使充满；满足；堵塞；任职 vi. 被充满，膨胀 n. 满足；填满的量；装填物 同义词:full of, fulfill, freight, meet, swell with, intumesce, satisfaction, content to fill the tub for a bath把浴盆注满水洗澡
vi. 滤过；渗入；慢慢传开 n. 滤波器；[化工] 过滤器；筛选；滤光器 vt. 过滤；渗透；用过滤法除去 同义词:sink in, seep into, strainer, percolator, penetrate, lauter You need to filter the drinking water.你需要把饮用水过滤。
n. 污秽；肮脏；猥亵；不洁 同义词:griminess, squalidity Anyway , we don't want this kind of filth in our courtroom .不管怎么样，我们法庭不接受这种脏货。
n. 财政，财政学；金融 vt. 负担经费，供给…经费 vi. 筹措资金 同义词:policy of tightening control over expenditure and credit, cameralistics, fund raising to finance a plan负担一项计划所需的经费
adv. 非常地；细微地；美好地；雅致地 同义词:considerably, remarkably, tremendously This white finely with the blue sky .白色的山峦同蔚蓝的天空交相辉映。
adj. 有限的；限定的 n. 有限之物 同义词:limited, narrow Even in America , resources are finite .即使在美国，资源也是有限的。
n. 壁炉 同义词:andiron, chimney place They usually hang up their stockings on the fireplace to wait for Santa Clause .他们通常把他们的长袜子挂在壁炉上等待圣诞老人。
n. 烟火；激烈情绪 同义词:protechny, sparkler This video is about the Chinese New Year of Pig firework in Vitoria Harbour Hong Kong .这部视频为我们展现的是农历猪年春节时香港维多利亚港的烟花。
n. 坚定；坚固；坚度 同义词:stability, steel, durability He reshuffled the cabinet to firm his government.他改组内阁以强化其政府。
adj. 第一流的；最上等的 adv. 非常好地；极佳 同义词:classical, royal, champion, tiptop Hutter is a first-rate look outer, and can pretty much scent danger , as a hound scents the deer .赫特是个机警的哨兵，他老远就能嗅出危险来，就象猎犬能嗅出鹿的味道。
n. 裂变；分裂；分体；分裂生殖法 同义词:fragmentation, disruption an element fissioned by high energy particles由高能粒子引起裂变的元素
n. 健康；适当；适合性 同义词:health, adaptability, relevance, wellness What matters is that both types of adaptation search the fitness space within the lifetime of an individual .重要的是，这两种适应形式都在个体的一生中探索着适合度空间。
n. 装配，装置；试穿，试衣 adj. 适合的，适宜的；相称的 同义词:assembly, device, apparatus, installation, unit, adaptive, calculated, matching, well, worthy Drink unfits a man for work.饮酒使人不能工作。

n. 设备；固定装置；固定于某处不大可能移动之物 同义词:equipment, furniture, facility, plant He has also found that CFLs last longer when used upright in a lamp -stand, rather than dangling from a ceiling fixture .记者还发现紧凑型荧光灯直立安装在灯座上比悬吊在天花板固定装置上使用寿命更长。
vi. 剥落；成片状剥落 vt. 使…成薄片；将…剥落 n. 小薄片；火花 同义词:chip, shell, spark, A FRAME An approach called PVD is main way to prepare nano scale flake at present .本文阐述的物理气相沉积法（vd法）目前制备纳米片状铝粉的主要方法。
n. 火焰；热情；光辉 v. 焚烧；泛红 同义词:passion, fire, warmth, set on fire The fire flamed intensely.火烧得很旺。
n. 侧面；侧翼；侧腹 vt. 守侧面；位于…的侧面；攻击侧面 vi. 侧面与…相接 adv. 在左右两边 同义词:side, profile plane High buildings flanked the alley.小巷两侧高楼耸立。
n. 法兰绒；法兰绒衣服；法兰绒巾 vt. 给…穿上法兰绒衣服；用法兰绒包 adj. 法兰绒的 同义词:caroset She bought a gray flannel coat .她买了件灰色的法兰绒外套。
n. 拍打，拍打声；[航] 副翼 vi. 拍动；鼓翼而飞；（帽边等）垂下 vt. 拍打；扔；拉下帽边；飘动 同义词:aileron, hang, wash, throw into The bird flapped its wings and flew away.那鸟振翅飞去。
n. [分化] 烧瓶；长颈瓶，细颈瓶；酒瓶，携带瓶 同义词:lagena, winebottle The flask culture process was analysed .同时对摇瓶发酵过程进行了分析。
vt. 击败，摧毁；使……平坦 vi. 变平；变单调 同义词:defeat, triumph over, even to flatten a piece of metal by hammering it把一块金属锤平
vt. 奉承；谄媚；使高兴 同义词:please, glad, satisfy He is flattering you.他是在奉承你。
n. 香味；滋味 vt. 给……调味；给……增添风趣 同义词:fragrance, perfume From some it derives a flavour which no culture or management can equal .从某些土壤中它能获取一种风味，那是无法通过培育和管理达到的。

n. 瑕疵，裂纹；缺点；一阵狂风 vt. 使无效；使破裂，使有缺陷 vi. 生裂缝，变的有缺陷 同义词:checking, defect, deficiency, vice, fault, crack, fracture The failure to reduce oil dependence is not the only flaw in the ethanol program .降低对石油依赖失败的原因不是因为乙醇项目存在问题。
vi. 逃走；消失，消散 vt. 逃跑，逃走；逃避 同义词:lift, disappear, blank, escape, desert The enemy were defeated and fled in disorder.敌人被击败后仓皇而逃。
adj. 灵活的；柔韧的；易弯曲的 同义词:elastic, pliable By this reckoning , a flexible body learns to acclimatize to stresses .由此可以判断，灵活可塑的身体学会适应压力。
n. 飞行；班机；逃走 vt. 射击；使惊飞 vi. 迁徙 同义词:fly, liner, pot, take a shot at Could you get me on an earlier flight ?你能让我搭上早一点的航班吗？
vt. 掷，抛；嘲笑；使陷入；轻蔑地投射；猛动 n. 掷，抛；嘲弄；急冲 vi. 猛冲，急行 同义词:throw, cast, pitch, put, cast, hurtle to fling a stone at a dog向狗投掷石块
vt. 使漂浮；实行 vi. 浮动；飘动，散播；摇摆；付诸实施 n. 彩车，花车；漂流物；浮舟；浮萍 同义词:execute, to put into practice, fan, swing, drift, caroche The hollow ball floated.空心球浮在水面上。

n. 群；棉束（等于floc） vt. 用棉束填满 vi. 聚集；成群而行 同义词:cluster, gang, bunch, qun, concentrate, collect, mass, crowd Students are flocking to such fields as genetics and molecular biology.大学生正在大量从事诸如遗传学和分子生物学等领域的研究。
vi. 波动；涨落；动摇 vt. 使波动；使动摇 同义词:wave motion, shake, destabilize fluctuating prices波动的价格
n. 起伏，波动 同义词:wave, undulation Sometimes temporal fluctuation may take place inthe local velocity .有时，在局部速度中可能出现瞬时脉动。

n. 激动，洋溢；面红；萌芽；旺盛；奔流 vt. 使齐平；发红，使发亮；用水冲洗；使激动 vi. 发红，脸红；奔涌；被冲洗 adj. 大量的；齐平的；丰足的，洋溢的；挥霍的 同义词:seed, warmth, excitation, agitation, heat, electrify, blush, massive, extensive, substantial, macro, much She began to flush with excitement.她由于激动脸开始发红。
vi. 飘动；鼓翼；烦扰 vt. 拍；使焦急；使飘动 n. 摆动；鼓翼；烦扰 同义词:fan, float, stream, swing, bob The birds fluttered excitedly in the trees.鸟儿在树林中兴奋地飞来飞去。

n. [流][机] 流量；变迁；不稳定；流出 vt. 使熔融；用焊剂处理 vi. 熔化；流出 同义词:issue, instability, fuse, discharge, issue, shed The problem may be even more severe for the small photospheric flux knots .对细小的光环磁通量节点来说，这些问题可能更为严峻。
vi. 飞；驾驶飞机；飘扬 vt. 飞行；飞越；使飘扬 n. 飞行；苍蝇；两翼昆虫 adj. 敏捷的 同义词:flow, stream, dance, overfly, flight, volation, sharp, keen, prompt, quick, smart A large bird flew past us.一只大鸟从我们这儿飞过。
n. 泡沫；水沫；灭火泡沫 vi. 起泡沫；吐白沫；起着泡沫流动 vt. 使起泡沫；使成泡沫状物 同义词:bubble, spray, yeast, spume a glass of foaming beer一杯起泡沫的啤酒
vt. 跟随；遵循；追求；密切注意 vi. 跟随；接着 n. 跟随；追随 同义词:string along, ambition, string along, go on to, me-tooism, sycophancy He followed her up the stairs.他跟随着她上楼去了。
n. 追随者；信徒；属下 同义词:Christian, old faithful He is very fond of rock music and is a faithful follower .他非常喜欢摇滚乐，是个忠实的追随者。
n. 人行道；小路；小径 同义词:path, pavement, sidewalk A knot of people was standing on the footpath outside his units.一群人站在他家门外的小路上。

adj. 以前的；在前部的 n. 前部；船头 adv. 在前面；在船头 prep. 在前 int. （打高尔夫球者的叫声）让开！ 同义词:previous, ago, front, onwards As China's middle class continued to grow , its appeal as a tourist destination came fore .随着中国中产阶层的持续壮大，海南作为旅游目的地的吸引力逐渐显现出来。
adj. 外国的；外交的；异质的；不相关的 同义词:external, diplomatic The most common complaint centres on foreign policy .最常见的抱怨集中在外交政策上。
vt. 预见；预知 同义词:predict, think ahead to foresee what will happen预知将发生的事件
n. 熔炉，锻铁炉；铁工厂 vi. 伪造；做锻工 vt. 伪造；锻造 同义词:furnace, smelter, trump up, to fake, doctor, trump up The smith forged the horseshoe with great skill.那铁匠非常熟练地锻造马蹄铁。
adj. 正式的；拘谨的；有条理的 n. 正式的社交活动；夜礼服 同义词:official, state, evening dress Have you ever been invited to attend any formal banquets ?你有被邀请参加任何正式的宴会过吗？
adv. 以前；原来 同义词:previously, ago, back Under his policies , countries sell the same kind of stuff at home that they formerly sold to foreigners .在他的政策下，所有国家都在本国出售同一种他们之前卖到国外的商品。
adj. 强大的；可怕的；令人敬畏的；艰难的 同义词:powerful, terrible, august, horrible Here the practical challenges would be formidable .这在实践中将面临巨大的挑战。
vt. 规划；用公式表示；明确地表达 同义词:programme, mark out to formulate a new theory系统地阐述一种新理论

n. 构想，规划；公式化；简洁陈述 同义词:planning, construct, programme, projection To conduct inspections over the regulated institutions directly , and take charge of the formulation of national on-site inspection plans .直接对被监管机构实施现场检查，同时负责制定全国性现场检查计划、方案。
vt. 放弃；断念 同义词:desert, yield, quit to forsake bad habits戒掉坏习惯
n. 堡垒；要塞；（美）边界贸易站 vt. 设要塞保卫 vi. 构筑要塞 同义词:tower, bastion This morning I went to the big mosque and fort in Old Delhi .今天早上我去了旧德里一座很大的清真寺和一座保垒。
adj. 即将来临的 n. 来临 同义词:upcoming, imminent, oncoming It seems that the cerebellum sends a signal to disregard forthcoming movement , then moves on to other things .看来小脑在发出信号忽视即将到来的动作，然后将注意力转移到其他事物上。
n. 堡垒；要塞 vt. 筑要塞；以要塞防守 同义词:tower, bastion But the fortress crashed shortly after take-off .但“飞行堡垒”起飞后不久就坠毁了。
n. 论坛，讨论会；法庭；公开讨论的广场 同义词:consultation, seminar The on-line forum provides a public way of sharing this discontent with others .在线论坛为人们提供了一个与他人同仇敌忾的公共途径。

adj. 向前的；早的；迅速的 adv. 向前地；向将来 vt. 促进；转寄；运送 n. 前锋 同义词:earlier, rapid, fast, ahead, ready, on, antrorsely, facilitate, promote, boost, freight, ship, stricker, vanguard He forwarded his friend's plan.他曾协助他朋友的计划。

n. 化石；僵化的事物；顽固不化的人 adj. 化石的；陈腐的，守旧的 同义词:petrification, reliquiae, banal, trite Fossil teeth , and the occasional skeleton , show that small mammals were common at this time .化石牙齿和偶尔发现的骨架显示小型哺乳动物在当时很普遍。
vt. 培养；养育，抚育；抱（希望等） adj. 收养的，养育的 同义词:cultivate, rear, raise, plant, mother to foster the sick照料病人

adj. 犯规的；邪恶的；污秽的；淤塞的 vt. 犯规；弄脏；淤塞；缠住，妨害 vi. 犯规；腐烂；缠结 n. 犯规；缠绕 adv. 违反规则地，不正当地 同义词:evil, ill, black, ugly, dirty, soil, mud, spot, dirty, break rules, rot away, illegality, wrong, unlawfully Factory chimneys foul the air with smoke.工厂烟囱的烟尘污染了空气。
n. 家禽；鸟；飞禽 vi. 打鸟；捕野禽 同义词:bird, poultry I could match my cousin 's game- cock with a fowl .我可以用一只更强壮的种鸡斗败我堂兄的公鸡。
n. 分数；部分；小部分；稍微 同义词:score, marks, proportion, part, portion But it receives only fraction of the research budget devoted to AIDS .但对肺结核病的研究经费投入只占艾滋病的一小部分。
n. 破裂，断裂；[外科] 骨折 vi. 破裂；折断 vt. 使破裂 同义词:cracking, rhexis, crack, come apart at the seams, crack, flaw He fell and fractured his leg.他摔下来跌断了腿。
adj. 脆的；易碎的 同义词:delicate, crumbly We have to face the fact that land is fragile .我们不得不正视一个事实，土地是脆弱的。
adj. 芳香的；愉快的 同义词:sweet, good, bright, aromatic The decision to do right lives fresh fragrant in our memory .这个决定是对的鲜活的存在我们的记忆中。
adj. 脆弱的；虚弱的 n. 灯心草篓；少妇；少女 同义词:weak, tender, slight, girl-o, chicklet It has sabotaged the frail vestiges of regional peace , and invited disaster upon Lebanon .它破坏了地区本就脆弱的那么一点点和平，给黎巴嫩带来了灾难。
n. 框架，骨架；结构，构架 同义词:configuration, mechanics, texture, structure One problem is procedural : what to do with the Kyoto framework .这有一个程序上的问题，即如何处理京都框架。
vt. 运送；装货；使充满 n. 货运；运费；船货 同义词:ship, transit, forward, charges, carriage They freighted the boat with bananas.他们把香蕉装载在船上。
n. 频率；频繁 同义词:periodicity Tags operate differently depending on several factors , especially the frequency at which they function .标签的运作根据几个不同的因素而异，尤其是其作用频率。
adj. 频繁的；时常发生的；惯常的 vt. 常到，常去；时常出入于 同义词:confirmed, continual, resort to to frequent the theater戏院的常客
vi. 显得新鲜；减少咸味；精神饱满 vt. 使清新；使新鲜；使精神焕发 同义词:irrigate to freshen vegetables up by putting them into water把蔬菜浸入水中使它们保持新鲜
vt. 使烦恼；焦急；使磨损 vi. 烦恼；焦急；磨损 n. 烦躁；焦急；磨损 同义词:trouble, irk, trouble, worry, anxiousness, wear and tear Doubts began to fret his mind.疑惑使他烦躁不安。
n. 摩擦，[力] 摩擦力 同义词:attrition, frottage But there are plenty of potential sources of friction between the two Pacific powers .不过，在（中美）两大太平洋强国之间，存在着诸多的潜在摩擦源。
n. 惊吓；惊骇 vt. 使惊恐 同义词:horror, pavor, alarm, exercise Harry , dear ! Gracious , Albus , you gave me a fright , you said not to expect you before morning !哈利，亲爱的！天哪，阿不思，你吓了我一跳，你说过你们明天早晨才会来的！
adj. 可怕的；惊人的；非常的 同义词:terrible, tremendous, intense, horrible, awesome My child will not die frightful malady , for lack of succor .我的孩子不会死了，那种病，吓坏我了，现在她有救了。
n. 边缘；穗；刘海 adj. 边缘的；附加的 vt. 加穗于 同义词:margin, ear, brink, suburb, additional, attached, marginal, plus, more The river is fringed with trees.河两边种有树。
adv. 向后；向那边 同义词:rear, aback Laune lay luxuriously swinging to and fro in his hammock , on a warm September afternoon .九月里一个闷热的下午，劳瑞懒懒地躺在他的吊床里晃来晃去。
n. 女装；连衣裙；僧袍；罩袍 同义词:suit-dress, one-piece dress frock shows your petticoat .珍，你的衬裙露出来了。
vt. 挫败；阻挠；使感到灰心 vi. 失败；受挫 adj. 挫败的；无益的 同义词:defeat, discomfit, founder, come to naught, thwarted, unprofitable to frustrate plans取消计划
adj. 激烈的；狂怒的；热烈兴奋的；喧闹的 同义词:acute, stinging It is furious about the Iraq war and George Bush .伊拉克战争和乔治。布什都让它很恼火。
adv. 进一步地；而且；更远地 adj. 更远的；深一层的 vt. 促进，助长；增进 同义词:moreover, besides, also, farther, facilitate, promote, boost, improve The government wishes to further the cause of peace.政府希望推动和平事业。
n. 狂怒；暴怒；激怒者 同义词:agriothymia, hopping mad " Beware the fury of a patient man " (John Dryden ).“当心容忍者的暴怒”（约翰·德莱顿）。
vi. 融合；熔化，熔融 vt. 使融合；使熔化，使熔融 n. 保险丝，熔线；导火线，雷管 同义词:flux, melt down, melt, flux, signal, safety wire Copper and zinc are fused to make brass.铜与锌熔合后形成黄铜。
vi. 小题大作；忙乱；焦燥；焦急；无事自扰 n. 大惊小怪，大惊小怪的人；小题大作；忙乱 vt. 使烦恼，使烦忧 同义词:make a big deal out of, break a butterfly on the wheel, alarmism, hoo-ha, trouble, irk Stop fussing and do your work!别大惊小怪，干你的工作吧!

vi. 赌博；孤注一掷；投机；打赌 vt. 赌博；孤注一掷；冒险假设 n. 赌博；冒险；打赌 同义词:game, venture, lay, put all one's eggs in one basket, shoot the works, risk, throw, gaming, venture, adventure He lost his money gambling at cards.他赌纸牌输掉了钱。
n. 歹徒，流氓；恶棍 同义词:tough, plug-ugly He is just a gangster .他只是一个不入流的流氓。
n. 间隙；缺口；空白 vi. 裂开 vt. 使成缺口 同义词:separation, blank, seam, spring off, jag There is an gap between what IQ tests can measure and what we want to them to show .在智商测试所能测量的和我们希望这些测试所显示的之间存在着巨大的鸿沟。
n. 车库；汽车修理厂；飞机库 vt. 把……送入车库 同义词:carbarn, carport Can we use the garage ?我们可以使用车库吗？
n. 大蒜；蒜头 同义词:Allium sativum At meal times the odour of sauerkraut vies with that of garlic .吃饭的时候，德国泡菜的气味和大蒜的气味互相竟争着。
n. 衣服，服装；外表，外观 vt. 给…穿衣服 同义词:clothes, person, array, thread, outside, dress sb. in a girl garmented in silk穿着真丝衣服的女孩
vt. 收集；收割；使…聚集；使…皱起 vi. 聚集；化脓；皱起 n. 聚集；衣褶；收获量 同义词:crop, harvest, concentrate, collect, mass, crowd, collection, clustering Gather the men together and we’ll start the march.把人集中起来，我们要出发了。
n. 聚集；集会；收款 v. 聚集（gather的ing形式） 同义词:collection, assembly, clustering, meet, aggregating If so , you might like to come to a gathering .假如这样的话，您可能喜欢过来聚一聚。

n. 齿轮；装置，工具；传动装置 vi. 适合；搭上齿轮；开始工作 vt. 开动；搭上齿轮；使……适合；使……准备好 adj. 好极了 同义词:apparatus, installation, facilities, vehicle, engine, serve, adapt to something, actuate, get under way An automobile moves when the motor is geared to the rear wheels.汽车的发动机连接于后轮时，汽车开动了。
n. 概括；普遍化；一般化 同义词:recapitulation, universalization We now state the generalization of the two previous problems .我们叙述前面两个问题的一般情形。
vt. 概括；推广；使...一般化 vi. 形成概念 同义词:extend, summarise, ideate to help the student generalize what he has learned帮助学生对他所学过的内容进行归纳
vt. 使形成；发生；生殖 同义词:go on, call into being His kind smile soon generated friendliness.他友善的微笑很快造成了友好的气氛。
n. 慷慨，大方；宽宏大量 同义词:liberality, large-handedness Their generosity is putting an additional burden on their limited resources .而他们的慷慨也成为有限资源的额外负担。
adj. 地理的；地理学的 The first is community -based organizations that serve populations in a small geographical area .第一部分是以社区为基础、小范围为人民服务的组织。
n. 地质学；地质情况 同义词:geologic map, geognosy Minerology is a brand of the great earth science geology .矿物学是大地科学地质学的一个分支。
adj. 几何的，几何学的 Right . And the only geometrical object in which every point on the surface is the same distance from the center is . . . ?是的。这么一来，能使地表所有的点都和地球中心的距离相等的唯一的几何物体是?。
n. [植] 胚芽，萌芽；细菌 vi. 萌芽 同义词:seed, plantule, burgeon, spring up Being in a " germ factory " is not necessarily all bad .在一个“细菌工厂”并不完全是不好的。
n. 姿态；手势 vi. 作手势；用动作示意 vt. 用动作表示 同义词:motion, sign, stance The policeman gestured for us to proceed.警察做手势示意我们向前走。

adj. 巨大的，庞大的 同义词:huge, enormous, tremendous, massive, macro With indecent haste , they have now switched to worrying that overly lax policies have created a gigantic bubble in shares and house prices .然而，现在他们又不假思索地匆匆转为担心：过度宽松的政策造成股价和房价形成巨大的泡沫。
n. 姜；姜黄色；精力；有姜味 vt. 用姜给…调味；使某人有活力 adj. 姜黄色的 同义词:energy, steam, vigor Why don't you steam those lobsters with ginger and scallion now ?你现在何不把那些龙虾和姜，葱一起蒸呢？
n. 微光；闪光；瞬息的一现 vi. 闪烁；隐约地闪现 vt. 使闪烁；使发微光 同义词:glimmer, stroboflash, spark, coruscate, flicker We saw the lights of the little town gleaming in the distance.我们看到远处小镇的灯光在闪烁。
n. [航] 滑翔机；滑翔员；滑翔导弹 同义词:sailplane, soarer glider coasted down onto the landing strip .滑翔机滑行下降在跑道上。
adj. 全球的；总体的；球形的 同义词:spherical, ball-shaped So from the global perspective , it is very important .所以从全局的角度来看，这是很重要的。
vt. 赞美；美化；崇拜（神）；使更壮丽 同义词:praise, celebrate, bless, worship, admire The film glorifies war and violence.这部影片颂扬了战争和暴力。
n. 术语（特殊用语）表；词汇表；专业词典 Use a Project Glossary .使用项目词汇表。
vt. 粘合；似胶般固着于 n. 胶；各种胶合物 同义词:conglutinate to glue the broken pieces together把碎片粘合起来
vt. 咬；折磨；侵蚀 vi. 咬；折磨；侵蚀 同义词:harry, worry, trouble, weather, tear, bite, grind down The dog was gnawing a bone.狗在啃骨头。
n. 女神，受崇拜的女性 同义词:nymph In Egyptian mythology , the goddess Isis was the universal mother goddess .在埃及神话中，女神伊希斯是世界之母。
int. 天哪 adj. 善良，优秀 ；精华，养分 同义词:humanity, excellence, mercy, kindness, omigod, bedad Goodness knows , they all would have been back at their desks by now .谁知道呢，他们现在都应该回到伦敦的办公桌前了。
adj. 华丽的，灿烂的；极好的 同义词:brilliant, wonderful, excellent, famous, super The good news was I met two gorgeous men !好消息是我遇到了两个很棒的男人！
n. 大猩猩 The judge was an old gray gorilla .法官是一只年老的灰猩猩。
n. 小道传闻；随笔；爱说长道短的人 vi. 闲聊；传播流言蜚语 同义词:essay, quidnunc, chat about, make conversation His gossip caused much mischief until the truth became known.他散布流言蜚语危害很大，事后才真相大白。
vt. 管理；支配；统治；控制 vi. 居支配地位；进行统治 同义词:manage, possess, conduct, run, regulate Who govern this country?谁统治这个国家?
vt. 攫取；霸占；将…深深吸引 vi. 攫取；夺取 n. 攫取；霸占；夺取之物 同义词:pounce at, commandeer, pounce at, snatch up, arrogation He grabbed her arm and pulled her out of the path of the car.他抓住了她的胳膊，把她拉出了车道。
adj. 亲切的；高尚的；和蔼的；雅致的 int. 天哪；哎呀 同义词:nice, friendly, sweet, delicate, magnificent, oh, my, dear, egad Her soft voice and gracious smile put everyone in the room at ease .她温柔的声音和慈祥的笑容使屋子里的每个人都感到轻松自在。

n. [数][物] 梯度；坡度；倾斜度 adj. 倾斜的；步行的 同义词:obliquity, lean, walking, raked Electro- osmosis drains the soil electrochemically by making the water move along an electric gradient in the clay.电渗透是用电化学方法使水沿泥土中的电梯度的方向运动，使土壤干燥。
n. 留声机 vt. 用唱片录制；用唱机播放 同义词:phono gramophone brayed out its vulgar tune .留声机闹哄哄地唱着庸俗的小调。
n. 花岗岩；坚毅；冷酷无情 同义词:moorstone Usually the Shinto god of the earth keeps the brute 's head pinned down with a granite keystone .地祗大明神通常能将狂兽的头压制在一块花岗岩要石下。

vt. 授予；允许；承认 vi. 同意 n. 拨款；[法] 授予物 同义词:award, let, accept, recognize, agree, accept, see with, to agree with, agree on/upon, be agreeable to, appropriation The government had granted them permission to leave the country.政府已经同意他们离开该国的请求。
n. 石墨；黑铅 vt. 用石墨涂（或搀入等） 同义词:lead, plumbagine He uses ultrasound to break up graphite into individual layers that are dispersed in a liquid .他的方式是使用超音波将石墨变成单独的薄膜层，分散在液体中。
n. 蚱蜢；[植保] 蝗虫；小型侦察机 vi. 见异思迁；蚱蜢似地跳 同义词:locust grasshopper did not listen.蝗虫根本听不进去。
adj. 长满草的；草绿色的 同义词:herby Today what remains of the fort at Albazino is grassy rectangular escarpment above the roiling river .今天，阿尔巴济诺要塞的遗址是一块长满绿草、陡峭的矩形高台，下面是滚滚的江水。
adj. 感谢的；令人愉快的，宜人的 同义词:pleasant, lovely, thankful All happy people are grateful .所有快乐的人是感恩的。

n. 碎石；砂砾 vt. 用碎石铺；使船搁浅在沙滩上；使困惑 同义词:rubble, crushed stone, confuse, perplex Whatever emerges from Congress , it will be merely a " down -payment ", says Ed Rendell, Pennsylvania gravel - voiced governor .宾夕法尼亚声音沙哑的州长埃德。蓝道尔说，其实不管国会最终作何决议，这也就算是付个“头款”而已。
vt. 放牧；擦伤 vi. 吃草；擦伤 n. 放牧；轻擦 同义词:grass, feed, raw, range, brush burn, pasturage to graze cattle放牛
vt. 涂脂于；贿赂 n. 油脂；贿赂 同义词:tamper with, buy over, lipid, fix How can I remove the stains ( grease )from my coat ?我上衣上的墨迹（油迹）怎样才能去掉?。
n. 贪婪，贪心 同义词:covetousness, avarice What drives the market is the balance between fear and greed .驱动市场的，是恐惧和贪婪之间的平衡。
n. 悲痛；忧伤；不幸 同义词:disaster, evil This is a great grief to us all .这对我们大家是个极大的不幸。
adj. 冷酷的；糟糕的；残忍的 同义词:frozen, cruel In Britain the situation was equally grim , but with one major difference .在英国，情况同样是严竣的，但有一个很大的区别。
v. 露齿而笑，咧着嘴笑 n. 露齿笑 The boy grinned from ear to ear when his mother gave him the apple.当小男孩的母亲给他苹果时，他咧嘴大笑。
vt. 磨碎；磨快 vi. 磨碎；折磨 n. 磨；苦工作 同义词:sharp, triturate, prey upon, lie on, milling Most of the wheat will be ground into flour.大多数麦子将磨成面粉。
n. [建] 凹槽，槽；最佳状态；惯例 vt. 开槽于 vi. 形成沟槽 同义词:tradition, usage, convention, best, slot The sink shelf is grooved so that the water will run off.洗池上刻有沟槽，以便水能流走。
vi. 摸索；探索 vt. 摸索 n. 摸索；触摸 同义词:explore, feel about, feel about, fish for, feel, floccillation She groped for her key in her bag.她在包里摸钥匙。
adj. 总共的；粗野的；恶劣的；显而易见的 vt. 总共收入 n. 总额，总数 同义词:robust, rough, country, dirty, bush, sum, amount, total Our company grossed over four million last year.我们公司去年总收入超过四百万。
n. 小树林；果园 同义词:bosket, orchard garden I will also share them with my staff at Pine Grove .我也会把它们分享给我在派恩格夫的同事们。
vi. 咆哮着说 vt. 咆哮；（雷电，炮等）轰鸣 n. 咆哮声；吠声；不平 同义词:huff and puff, bark, ululation, discontentment The dog growled at me.狗朝我狂吠。
vi. 抱怨；嘟囔 n. 怨言 vt. 喃喃地说出 adj. 抱怨地表示；嘟囔地说 同义词:beef about, repine, earful, querimony, mouth She is always grumbling!她总是喃喃诉苦!
n. 咕哝；呼噜声 vi. 作呼噜声；发哼声 vt. 咕哝着说 同义词:oink, harrumph The boy grunted in answer.男孩嘟哝着回答。
n. 犯罪，过失；内疚 同义词:error, crime, mistake, sin, blame Why should he be sacrificed to camouflage the guilt of others ?为什么他就该因为隐藏他人的过错而牺牲呢？
n. 吉他，六弦琴 vi. 弹吉他 How do you think one can guitar well?你认为一个人要怎样才能弹好吉他呢？
n. 风味；一阵狂风；趣味 vi. 一阵阵地劲吹 同义词:flavor, interest Then gust of wind whips the dust along the road.树木漆黑而僵硬，一阵狂风鞭打着它们的枝条。
n. 排水沟；槽；贫民区 vi. 流；形成沟 vt. 开沟于…；弄熄 adj. 贫贱的；粗俗的；耸人听闻的 同义词:drainage ditch, barrel-drain, stream, douse, low, coarse to gutter a new house在新屋的屋檐下安装导水槽
n. 冰雹；致敬；招呼；一阵 vt. 致敬；招呼；向...欢呼；猛发；使象下雹样落下（过去式hailed，过去分词hailed，现在分词hailing，第三人称单数hails） vi. 招呼；下雹 int. 万岁；欢迎 同义词:precipitation, blast, welcome, rah They hailed him as King.大家欢呼拥戴他为国王。
vt. 二等分；把……减半 同义词:bisect In any case, we could halve the benefit.在任何情况下我们都将利益均分。
n. 火腿；业余无线电爱好者；蹩脚演员 vi. 表演过火 vt. 演得过火 adj. 过火的；做作的 同义词:amateur radio, overplay, affected, stagey They take some bread and ham to make sandwiches .他们买了一些面包和火腿做三明治。
vt. 妨碍；束缚；使困累 n. 食盒，食篮；阻碍物 同义词:let, chain, bound, hindrance, incumbrance A steady rain hampered the progress of the work.持续不停的大雨妨碍了工程的进展。
n. 手册；指南 同义词:manual, guide, notebook Does Xiao Fei get the College Handbook ?小飞借到大学写作手册了吗？
n. 障碍；不利条件，不利的因素 vt. 妨碍，阻碍；使不利 同义词:obstacle, let, bar, dam, disadvantage, let, slow He was handicapped by his height.他的身高妨碍了他的发展。

n. 散发材料（免费发给的新闻通报）；上课老师发的印刷品；文字资料 （会议上分发的）；施舍物 同义词:charity I have a handout here with references on the subject , so if you are interested , please come up to the desk and take a copy .我有关于这个科目参考的手册，如果你有兴趣，到桌子这拿个复印本。
adj. 便利的；手边的，就近的；容易取得的；敏捷的 同义词:sharp, quick, smart, keen, fly That gives him handy extra weapon — if he chooses to use it .如果他选择去使用的话，这将是他可以使用的额外“武器”。
vi. 藏匿；入港停泊；庇护 vt. 庇护；藏匿；入港停泊 n. 海港（等于harbor）；避难所 同义词:secrete, haven, home to harbour a criminal窝藏罪犯
adj. 努力的；硬的；困难的；辛苦的；确实的；严厉的；猛烈的；冷酷无情的 adv. 努力地；困难地；辛苦地；接近地；猛烈地；牢固地 同义词:difficult, severe, fierce, tight, violent, closely, heavily, strong I work hard and play hard .我拼命地工作，也尽情地玩。
adj. 坚强的；勇敢的；能吃苦耐劳的；鲁莽的 n. 强壮的人；耐寒植物；方柄凿 同义词:strong, tough, game, brave, steel Sheep are hardy animals , needing little care , except at lambing and shearing time .羊是耐苦动物，除了养羔及剪毛时期，几乎不需要照料。
adj. 和谐的，和睦的；协调的；悦耳的 同义词:united, balanced, sweet, friendly, musical At home , he hopes to create a " harmonious society ".在国内他希望建立一个“和谐社会”。
vi. 弹奏竖琴；喋喋不休；不停地说 n. 竖琴 同义词:go on about sth, witter She began to harp us to drink after dinner.用餐后，她开始弹奏起竖琴让我们饮酒消食。
adj. 严厉的；严酷的；刺耳的；粗糙的；刺目的 同义词:severe, grinding, crude, tight, hard First , it is unfair to impose harsh penalties for small offences .首先，对情节轻微的犯罪施以严惩是不公平的。
n. 孵化；舱口 vt. 孵；策划 vi. 孵化 同义词:incubation, engineer, scheme, incubate to hatch eggs孵蛋，抱窝
adj. 傲慢的；自大的 同义词:arrogant, assuming Miss Pybus said she was cold haughty .皮不斯小姐说她冷若冰霜，不把人放在眼里。
n. 拖，拉；用力拖拉；努力得到的结果；捕获物；一网捕获的鱼量；拖运距离 vt. 拖运；拖拉 vi. 拖，拉；改变主意；改变方向 同义词:pull, catch, drag, drag one's feet, draw, pull She hauled her large box into the room.她把那只大箱子拖进了房间。
vt. 常出没于…；萦绕于…；经常去… vi. 出没；作祟 n. 栖息地；常去的地方 同义词:habitat, purlieu He haunted the British Museum when living in London.在伦敦居住期间，他常去不列颠博物馆。
vt. 赌运气；冒…的危险，使遭受危险 n. 危险，冒险；冒险的事 同义词:risk, risk, throw, venture, adventure In making the investment, he hazarded all his savings.他不顾风险，把所有的积蓄全都投了资。

n. 头；头痛；上端；最前的部分；理解力 vt. 前进；用头顶；作为…的首领；站在…的前头；给…加标题 vi. 出发；成头状物；船驶往 adj. 头的；主要的；在顶端的 同义词:intelligence, understanding, to go forward, make one's way, leave, set out, primary, major, central, leading, great He headed us into a small separate room.他领着我们走进了一个小单间儿。
n. 标题；（足球）头球；信头 v. 用头顶（head的ing形式） 同义词:title, titel But France is also undoubtedly heading for a period of turbulence .然而法国也将无庸置疑地进入一段动荡时期。
adj. 轻率的；头向前的；匆促而用力的 adv. 头向前地；猛然用力地 同义词:hasty, thoughtless George jumped from the basket and headlong into the snow .乔治从车斗里跳出来，倒栽葱地摔倒在雪地里。

n. 总部；指挥部；司令部 同义词:command, main office Leaders and high-level officials from around the world all need( will meet at ) the Food and Agriculture Organization [ headquarters ].领导者们和从直接各地而来的高级官员将在粮食和农业组织总部会面。
n. 灶台；炉边；炉床；壁炉地面 同义词:cooking bench, ingleside I suppose this resemblance disarmed Mr. Heathcilff : he walked to the hearth in evident agitation .我猜想这种相象使希刺克厉夫缓和了：他显然很激动地走到炉边。
adj. 衷心的；丰盛的；健壮的；精神饱满的 n. 朋友们；伙伴们 同义词:devout, stuggy, guys Curd -cheese with fruit , egg , caviar , and hearty bread .切片奶酪配水果、鸡蛋、鱼子酱和切片面包。
n. 加热器；加热工 同义词:warmer, heating appliance There is an electric immersion heater , though .但是有一个浸入式电热水器。
vt. 举起；使起伏；投掷；恶心；发出（叹息等） vi. 起伏；举起；喘息；呕吐 n. 举起；起伏；投掷；一阵呕吐 同义词:lift up, hold up, wave, roll, up with, putting, fluctuation, cast, lift He heaved his wounded arm.他奋力抬起他那只受伤的胳臂。
n. 天堂；天空；极乐 同义词:sky, paradise, air, high Her house is like cat heaven .她的房子就是猫的天堂。
vt. 提高；增高；加强；使更显著 vi. 升高；变强 同义词:enhance, raise, cement, muscle, strengthen, breeze up The enthusiasm of the audience was heightened by the climax of the play.全剧的高潮令观众的情绪高涨。
n. 半球 同义词:semisphere He said despite economic gains throughout the hemisphere , too many people remain mired in poverty .他说尽管整个半球的经济在增长，太多人仍深陷在贫穷的泥潭中。
adv. 今后；自此以后 同义词:forwards, hereafter Like Fitz , Mr Brown henceforth be a New Labour dog .而自此以后，布朗先生就像菲茨一样成为新工党之狗。
n. 先驱；传令官；报信者 vt. 通报；预示…的来临 同义词:precursor, forerunner One falling leaf heralds the coming of autumn.一片落叶预示着秋天的来临。
n. 香草，药草 同义词:bouquet garni, vanilla The herb 's health benefits include stimulating circulation , relieving muscle pains , and preventing headaches .这种香草的疗效包括促进血液循环，舒缓肌肉疼痛及预防头痛等。
n. 兽群，畜群；放牧人 vi. 成群，聚在一起 vt. 放牧；使成群 同义词:drove, menagerie, grass, feed, range Wild geese herd to the south in autumn every year.每年秋天大雁都成群结队地飞往南方。
vi. 踌躇，犹豫；不愿 vt. 踌躇，犹豫；有疑虑，不愿意 同义词:vacillate, stand at, stand at, hang back He hesitated and asked me if he could sit near me.他犹豫了一下，问能不能在我身边坐下。
vt. 隐藏；隐瞒；鞭打 vi. 隐藏 n. 躲藏；兽皮；躲藏处 同义词:lock, pocket, conceal, bottle up, keep in, fell, jook Hearing someone come in, he hid himself behind the curtain.听见有人进来了，他一闪身藏在了窗帘的后面。
vi. 远足；徒步旅行；上升 vt. 提高；拉起；使…高涨 n. 远足；徒步旅行；涨价 同义词:trip, arise, raise, go up, climb, enhance, raise, walking tour, excursion How do we get there? —Let's go hiking.咱们怎么去那儿呀? —走着去吧。
n. 障碍；妨碍；妨害；阻碍物 同义词:intervention, prevention, obstacle, let, bar Capital expenditure is a hindrance rather than a help .资本支出只会碍事，不会带来帮助。
n. 铰链；枢纽；关键 vt. 给…安装铰链 vi. 依…而转移 同义词:key, crux He slowly opened the lid that hinged to the box.他慢慢地打开了用合页接合的箱子盖。
n. 臀部；蔷薇果；忧郁 adj. 熟悉内情的；非常时尚的 同义词:bottom, croup He was hipped when he dropped from the tree.他从树上跌落了下来，把髋关节摔脱了臼。
vi. 发出嘘声；发嘘声 n. 嘘声；嘶嘶声 同义词:boo, fizzer, shush The snake hissed and attacked me, but I still stood unmovingly, then it crawled away.那条蛇发着嘶嘶声朝我攻击过来，但我仍然一动不动地站着，于是那条蛇便爬走了。
n. 历史学家 The Estonian politician and historian Mart Laar is one of the most prolific authors I know .爱沙尼亚政治历史学家马特是我所知道的最多产的作家之一。
adj. 有历史意义的；历史上著名的 The defeat of the coup gave Russia an historic chance to liquidate the organisation .这次政变失败为俄罗斯扫清克格勃组织提供了历史的机会。
vt. 打击；袭击；碰撞；偶然发现；伤…的感情 vi. 打；打击；碰撞；偶然碰上 n. 打；打击；（演出等）成功；讽刺 同义词:dong, impact on, impact on, beat upon, success, prosperity, victory, blow, stroke She hit him a hard blow.她狠狠地打了他一拳。

adv. 迄今；至今 同义词:hereunto, erenow Thanks to America , and only thanks to America , the world has enjoyed these past decades an age of hitherto unimagined freedom and opportunity .由于美国，并且也只是多亏了美国的存在，在过去几十年里世界才享有迄今无法想象的自由和机会。
adj. 嘶哑的 同义词:throaty She says something in hoarse whisper .她用沙哑的声音说了些什么。
vt. 锄，用锄头 vi. 用锄耕地 n. 锄头 Hoe the wheat today, and the cotton tomorrow.今天给小麦松土除草，明天锄棉花。
n. 起重机；升起，吊起 vi. 升起；吊起 vt. （用绳索，起重机等）使升起 同义词:crane, derrick, lift, heave up The mixed cement has been hoisted up the building.拌好的水泥灰浆已吊到建筑物顶上了。

adj. 空的；中空的，空腹的；凹的；虚伪的 n. 洞；山谷；窟窿 vt. 使成为空洞 vi. 形成空洞 adv. 彻底地；无用地 同义词:empty, artificial, false, bare, vacant, hole, cavity, cavitate, thoroughly, entirely, completely, fully, tight He hollowed out a cave in the snowfield for night.他在雪原上挖了个洞以过夜。
adj. 家庭的；平凡的；不好看的 同义词:household, domestic, family, ordinary, stock A homely child often develops into an attractive girl .一个相貌平庸的小孩常会长成一个漂亮的姑娘。
adj. 均匀的；[数] 齐次的；同种的 同义词:conspecific We should note that the elements of a flexibility matrix are not necessarily dimensionally homogeneous .我们应该注意柔度矩阵中的诸元素不一定是量纲完全一样。
n. 挂钩，吊钩 vt. 钩住；引上钩 vi. 钩住；弯成钩状 同义词:towing eye, drawhook, hitch I hooked his foot when he passed me and he staggered but didn't fall.他从我身边走过时我勾住了他的脚，他被绊了一个趔趄可并没摔倒。
vt. 跳跃；跳过 n. 跳跃；舞会；短途旅行 vi. 跳跃；单脚跳；作短途旅行 同义词:jump, clear, jump, ball, dance, spring, jump, dance Gazelles often hop when running.瞪羚在奔跑时不时地齐足跳行。
n. [天] 地平线；视野；眼界；范围 同义词:extent, boundary, region, spectrum, territory, area The captain swept the horizon with a telescope .船长用望远镜环视了一下地平线。
n. 喇叭，号角；角 vt. 装角于 同义词:angle, hao to horn deer截锯鹿角
n. 软管；长统袜；男性穿的紧身裤 vt. 用软管浇水；痛打 同义词:flexible pipe, flexible conduit, light into, belabour to hose the car用水冲洗汽车
n. 好客；殷勤 同义词:complaisance, gallantry Thanks a lot for your hospitality .非常感谢你的热情接待。
n. 人质；抵押品 同义词:guarantee, pledge In practice , of course , farmers will still be hostage to the whims of the collective and its often ugly human faces .当然在实际上，农民们仍将被当作头脑发热的集体所有制和人性丑恶面的牺牲品。
n. 女主人，女老板；女服务员；舞女；女房东 同义词:goodwife, mistress Does she accept to hostess my birthday celebration?她答应作我生日庆祝的女主持了吗?
adj. 敌对的，敌方的；怀敌意的 n. 敌对 同义词:adverse, enemy, opposed, opposition, antagonism She is ruled a hostile witness by the judge .她被法官裁定是一个怀有敌意的证人。
vt. 追猎；烦扰；激励 n. 猎犬；卑劣的人 同义词:stimulate, eat, burden, power, hunter, gundog I hounded a criminal to San Francisco.我追踪一名罪犯，一直追到旧金山。
n. 住宅；家庭；机构；议会；某种用途的建筑物 vt. 覆盖；给…房子住；把…储藏在房内 vi. 住 同义词:residence, organization, machinery, family, home, invest, sheet, roof, cap We should manage to house and feed the poor.我们得设法解决贫民的食宿问题。
vi. 盘旋，翱翔；徘徊 n. 徘徊；盘旋；犹豫 vt. 孵；徘徊在…近旁 同义词:plane, orbit, vibration, spinning around, brood, hatch Seagulls hover over the surging waves.海鸥在惊涛骇浪上翱翔。
vi. 咆哮；怒吼；狂吠 vt. 狂喊着说；对…吼叫 n. 嗥叫；怒号；嚎哭 同义词:gnar, huff and puff, bluster I haven't heard wolves howling for a long time.我已经有好长时间听不到狼的嗥叫了。
vt. 拥抱；紧抱；抱有，坚持 vi. 拥抱；紧抱在一起；挤在一起 n. 拥抱；紧抱；固执 同义词:press, stay, embrace, tough, embrace, cuddle, embrace, persistence They warmly hugged me to show their welcomes.他们热烈地拥抱我，以表达他们对我的欢迎。
n. 船体；（果实的）外壳 vt. [粮食] 去壳 同义词:crust, outer housing, unshell, decorticate to hull a banana剥去香蕉的果皮
vi. 发低哼声 vt. 用哼声表示 n. 嗡嗡声；哼声；杂声 int. 哼；嗯 同义词:groaning, zoom, uh-uh, um A bee hummed around flowers.一只蜜蜂围着花朵嗡嗡作响。
adj. 人道主义的；博爱的；基督凡人论的 n. 人道主义者；慈善家；博爱主义者；基督凡人论者 同义词:philanthropic, caritative, philanthropist, charitarian TO HIS local newspaper , he was " a great leader and humanitarian ".家乡的报纸称他是一位“伟大的领袖和人道主义者”。
n. 人类；人道；仁慈；人文学科 同义词:mankind, people, mercy, kindness AIDS and cancer are maladies that afflict humanity .爱滋病和癌症是折磨人类的疾病。
n. [气象] 湿度；湿气 同义词:wet, moisture capacity Warm , sinking air can hamper cloud formation , which results in less rain and lower overall humidity .温暖、下沉的空气能够阻碍云的形成，致使降雨减少，空气和土壤的湿度降低。
vt. 丢下；用力投掷；愤慨地说出 vi. 猛投；猛掷 n. 用力的投掷 同义词:let drop At last they hurled huge stones at enemy's heads.最后，他们用大石头向敌人的头上用力掷了过去。
n. 欢呼声；激动；混乱 vi. 欢呼；叫好 vt. 欢呼；为…喝采 int. 万岁；好哇（等于hurray） 同义词:chaos, disorder, confusion, warmth, involvement, cheer, cheer, rah, huzza People hurrahed to de Gaulle for 20 minutes.人们向戴高乐高呼万岁达20多分钟。
n. 飓风，暴风 同义词:cyclone, storms They have to rebuild their home after the havoc of the hurricane .遭受飓风的巨大破坏后，他们不得不重建家园。

vt. 使受伤；损害；使疼痛；使痛心 vi. 感到疼痛；有坏处；带来痛苦 n. 痛苦；危害；痛苦的原因 adj. 受伤的；痛苦的；受损的 同义词:wound, blast, pain, smart, painfulness, injured, painful, wounded, bitter She fell down the stairs and hurt her leg.她从楼上跌了下来，摔伤了腿。
vt. 安静；肃静；缄默 n. 安静；肃静；沉默 vi. 沉默；安静下来 int. 嘘；别作声 同义词:keep silent, silence, tranquilness, pipe down, fall silent, sh, hist All of us hushed when the President walked in.当总统走进来时，我们大家全都静了下来。
adj. 液压的；水力的；水力学的 同义词:waterpower The maximum density is governed by the allowable limit of fluidity for hydraulic transport .最大密度是由水力输送所容许的流态极限控制的。
n. [有化] 碳氢化合物 During incomplete combustion some of the hydrocarbon fuel is cracked .在不完全的燃烧中，一些烃燃料裂解。
n. 赞美诗；圣歌；欢乐的歌 vt. 唱赞美歌 vi. 唱赞歌 同义词:spiritual, chorale He was much hymned after his death.他死后曾大受赞颂。
n. 假设 同义词:tentative His hypothesis turned out to be correct .事实证明他的假设是正确的。
n. 冰；冰淇淋；矜持；（俚）钻石 vt. 冰镇；结冰 vi. 结冰 adj. 冰的 同义词:gelato, reservedness, glacial In winter, the weather in the North can ice people's breath.冬天，北方的天气冷得可以使人们呼出的呵气立即结冰。
adj. 冰冷的；冷淡的；结满冰的 同义词:cold, ice-cold The moon Calisto also has a number of big holes in its rocky and icy crust .卡利斯托卫星的岩石和冰的外壳上面也有一些大的洞穴。
n. 唯心主义，理想主义；理念论 同义词:mentalism At the root of Don Quixote 's madness is his idealism .堂吉诃德疯狂的根源是他的理想主义。
adv. 理想地；观念上地 Ideally , each of your top five values should lead you to a specific , key goal .理想情况下，你的五大价值观都会引出一个明确而关键的目标。
adj. 同一的；完全相同的 n. 完全相同的事物 同义词:self, same Then he let the soup of identical bugs replicate and ferment .然后他令这些一模一样的菌虫复制并发酵。
n. 鉴定，识别；认同；身份证明 同义词:authentication, recognition And when customers sign up , they have to produce some form of identification .当顾客签约接受服务，他们必须拿出一些身份证明。
n. 笨蛋，傻瓜；白痴 同义词:simple, turkey, natural, put, stupid Who was idiot who kept honking ?到底是哪个白痴在不停的按喇叭？
n. 懒惰；闲散；失业 同义词:unemployment, inapplication Don't idle away your time.别浪费光阴。
vt. 点燃；使燃烧；使激动 vi. 点火；燃烧 同义词:heat, light, burn, light the fire He ignited the stove fire with pieces of wood.他用一些木块燃了炉火。
n. 无知，愚昧；不知，不懂 同义词:darkness, unwisdom I attempted to mask my ignorance by keeping my head down and not speaking unless spoken to.我试图掩盖自己的无知，每天低着头干活，除非别人跟我说话，否则不主动交谈。
adj. 文盲的；不识字的；没受教育的 n. 文盲 同义词:letterless, unlettered, unschooled, analphabetic Her powers had received no aid from education : she was ignorant and illiterate .她的才能没能得到教育的帮助，她蒙昧无知。
vt. 阐明，说明；照亮；使灿烂；用灯装饰 vi. 照亮 同义词:say, lamp, elucidate, clarify, light up, to shine In the countryside, houses are still illuminated by oil lamps.在农村，房屋仍然靠油灯照明。
n. 幻觉，错觉；错误的观念或信仰 同义词:hallucination, fantasm But earth 's flowers of illusion are kept eternally fresh by death .但是大地的幻象的花朵，却被死亡保持得永远新鲜。
n. 模仿，仿造；仿制品 adj. 人造的，仿制的 同义词:simulation, mimicry, artificial, synthetic This is almost certainly in imitation of the similar American custom .这个用法几乎可以肯定是模仿美国的类似习惯。
vt. 沉浸；使陷入 同义词:let sb in for, entrap He is immersed in the swimming pool.他完全沉进了水中。
vi. 移入 vt. 使移居入境 同义词:move into Many Jews immigrated into the United States.许多犹太人移居美国。
adj. 不朽的；神仙的；长生的 n. 神仙；不朽人物 同义词:eternal, monumental, jinnee, djinni You have placed his immortal soul in jeopardy .你已经陷害了他永生的灵魂。
vt. 给予（尤指抽象事物），传授；告知，透露 同义词:afford, allow, deal, reveal, extend The carpet imparted an air of elegance to the room.地毯使房间有了一种优雅的气氛。
adj. 公平的，公正的；不偏不倚的 同义词:judicial, fair, just, equitable " All quite simple . " says an impartial observer , Charles .“这实在非常简单。”一个公正的观察者查尔斯说。
vt. 实施，执行；实现，使生效 n. 工具，器具；手段 同义词:accomplish, perform, come true, fulfill, enforce, instrument, facilities, vehicle, tool, engine to implement a promise履行诺言
vt. 恳求或乞求 vi. 恳求或乞求 to implore somebody to do something恳求某人做某事
vi. 利用；欺骗；施加影响 vt. 强加；征税；以…欺骗 同义词:do with, trade on, force, levy tax to impose duties on imported wines向进口酒征税
vt. 盖印；强征；传送；给予某人深刻印象 vi. 给人印象 n. 印象，印记；特征，痕迹 同义词:propagate, print, mark, characteristic, trace to impress one's seal on a letter在信上盖章
adj. 不正确的，错误的；不适当的；不合礼仪的 同义词:false, wrong, incorrect, unhappy, inadequate A secret committee had determined to rid the town of all improper persons .一个秘密委员会已经决定把镇上所有不正派的人都清除掉。
n. 冲动；[电子] 脉冲；刺激；神经冲动；推动力 vt. 推动 同义词:stimulus, pulse, incentive, excitement, needle, drive, force, impel Some dim impulse moved the policeman to look suspiciously at Tom .一点模糊的冲动促使警察疑心地看着汤姆。
n. 杂质；不纯；不洁 同义词:foreign matters, nastiness Crude oil or unprocessed petroleum , is called sour when it contains a lot of ( sulfur ), an impurity .原油，或未加工石油，在它含有大量硫磺这种杂质时，就称为“酸的”。
adj. 难达到的；难接近的；难见到的 IT IS usually agreed that casinos should , in the public interest , be inaccessible and expensive .大家通常认为，为了保证公共利益，应该提高赌场的门槛和成本。
adj. 错误的 同义词:false, wrong, incorrect, improper, erroneous The problem is not that such authors are inaccurate .问题不在于这些作家是不准确的。
adj. 不充分的，不适当的 同义词:deficient, unhappy, wrong, inappropriate, improper Very often , television coverage of news is superficial and inadequate .电视中的新闻报导常常是肤浅的，不充分的。
adv. 因…的原因 His duty is to assist the aggrieved person inasmuch as he is able .他的责任是尽他所能帮助受冤屈的人。
vt. 创新；开辟；开创；举行开幕典礼；举行就职典礼 同义词:pioneer to inaugurate a president为总统举行就职典礼
adj. 不能的；无能力的；不能胜任的 同义词:unable, powerless To be blind is not miserable , incapable of bearing that is .失明本身并非是悲惨的，不能忍受失明才是悲惨的。
vt. 向…焚香；使…发怒 n. 香；奉承 vi. 焚香 同义词:court, joss stick to become incensed with somebody对某人发怒
n. 发生率；影响；[光] 入射；影响范围 同义词:infection, impression, effect, influence, affection Prevalence and incidence are covered in the following section .以下部分包括流行状况和影响范围。
adv. 顺便；偶然地；附带地 同义词:passingly, accidentally Dr. Watson , incidentally was American - born , which shows that basic science is international .出于偶然，沃森博士出生于美国，这表明，基础科学是国际性的。
n. 倾向，爱好；斜坡 同义词:tendency, liability, hill, trend, interest Desire or inclination .欲望或倾向。
vi. 倾斜；倾向；易于 vt. 使倾斜；使倾向于 n. 倾斜；斜面；斜坡 同义词:pitch, slope, affect, slope, lean, hill, slope, decline, pitch The road inclines upward.这条路向上倾斜。
adj. 包括的，包含的 同义词:containing, encompassing Culture is an abstract and sometimes all- inclusive term .文化是抽象的，有时是一个包括一切的术语。

adj. 不相容的；矛盾的；不能同时成立的 n. 互不相容的人或事物 同义词:antipathic, contradictory This program is linked to the missing export in the file . This machine may have an incompatible version of .该程序被链接到已不存在的出口（位于文件中）。这台机器可能有版本不兼容的。
adj. 不完全的；[计] 不完备的 同义词:half, synsemantic Therefore our knowledge of the core is quite incomplete .因此我们对地核的认识还非常不全面。
vt. 包含，吸收；体现；把……合并 vi. 合并；混合；组成公司 adj. 合并的；一体化的；组成公司的 同义词:involve, contain, absorb, comprise, merge, mix together, amalgamative, pooled to be incorporated a member of the union被吸收为工会会员
adj. 难以置信的，惊人的 同义词:tremendous, unbelievable, spectacular, fabulous No one who isn't directly involved would ever believe the incredible duplication and futility .不直接卷入的人没有一个会相信这种不可置信的重复和徒劳。
adj. 不确定的；无限的；模糊的 同义词:fuzzy, huge, dark, infinite, unsure He gave me indefinite answer .他给我的答复模棱两可。

adj. 象征的；指示的；表示…的 n. 陈述语气；陈述语气的动词形式 同义词:symbolic, emblematic Others see it as indicative of the fluidity of a global economy experiencing cyclical shocks and secular realignments .另一些人则认为，这显示出正经历周期性危机与长期调整的全球经济的易变性。
n. 愤慨；愤怒；义愤 同义词:anger, wrath The manager expressed his indignation at being unfairly dismissed by the president .经理对他被总裁不公平解雇的一事愤愤不平。
adj. 不可缺少的；绝对必要的；责无旁贷的 n. 不可缺少之物；必不可少的人 同义词:obbligato Your help is indispensable to me .你的帮助对我是绝对必要的。
adj. 个人的；个别的；独特的 n. 个人，个体 同义词:personal, different, subjective, distinct, unique, unity, private person At the individual level , no one can blame these graduates .从个人层面讲，谁都无权指责这些毕业生。
adj. 室内的，户内的 同义词:chamber, endocellular Even a common indoor plant can improve the feeling of a room .即便一种普普通通的室内植物也能提高室内感觉。
vt. 诱导；引起；引诱；感应 同义词:attract, produce, cause, operate, occasion These attractions induce people to travel in that country.这些诱人之处吸引人们到那个国家去旅游。
n. [电磁] 感应；归纳法；感应现象 同义词:reaction, inductive method Both induction and deduction are essential characteristics of rational thinking .归纳与推论都是理性思维的重要特征。
vt. 满足；纵容；使高兴；使沉迷于… vi. 沉溺；满足；放任 同义词:meet, fulfill, fill, please, baby, luxuriate, to satisfy to indulge oneself in smoking纵情吸烟
adj. 勤勉的 同义词:diligent, hard-working This saying , therefore , teaches us to be industrious .因此，这句格言教导我们要勤奋用功。
n. [力] 惯性；惰性，迟钝；不活动 同义词:nonreactivity, inaction The genes harbor their own wisdom and their own inertia .基因拥有自己的智慧和自己的惯性。
adv. 不可避免地；必然地 同义词:necessarily, ineluctably Young people today understand that the world is now truly and inevitably smaller .今天的年轻人发现世界在变小是真实的却不可避免的。
vt. 感染，传染 同义词:affect, contract, catch, disease, communicate She was infected with tuberculosis.她被传染上了肺结核。
adj. 传染的；传染性的；易传染的 同义词:catching, epidemic It calls for huge new investments in methods to prevent and treat infectious diseases .报告要求投入新的巨资来研究预防和治疗传染病的方法。
vt. 推断；推论 vi. 推断；作出推论 同义词:understand, conclude, reason, conclude, deduce from to infer a motive from an effect从效果推知动机
n. 推理；推论；推断 同义词:conclusion, reasoning, consequence What inference do you draw from these facts ?从这些事实你推断出什么结论？
adj. 差的；自卑的；下级的，下等的 n. 下级；次品 同义词:junior, lower, lessness, subordinate The speaker claims that competition teaches inferior enterprises how to survive and develop .发言人称竞争教会了较差的企业如何去生存与发展。

adj. 无限的，无穷的；无数的；极大的 n. 无限；[数] 无穷大；无限的东西（如空间，时间） 同义词:huge, tremendous, thousand, million, boundless, Mugen, immenseness We must accept finite disappointment , but we must never lose infinite hope .我们必须接受有限的失望，但是不能失去无限的希望。
adv. 无限地；极其 同义词:extremely, most, rare Yet even if the fiscal rope is not infinitely long , slashing deficits now would be wrong .不过，即使财政救生索并非无限长，当下大幅削减赤字也会是错误的。
n. 无穷；无限大；无限距 同义词:boundlessness, without end You are the only one like you in a sea of infinity !在无限的世界里你是独一无二的。
n. 膨胀；通货膨胀；夸张；自命不凡 同义词:expansion, bulking This could be due to inflation .这个可能归因于通货膨胀。
n. 影响；势力；感化；有影响的人或事 vt. 影响；改变 同义词:effect, infection, impression, affection, incidence, affect, impact of, impact on, reach, fashion The weather influences crops.天气影响收成。
adj. 有独创性的；机灵的，精制的；心灵手巧的 同义词:prepared, clever Ingenious circuits can be designed that correct for changes in the receiver sensitivity .设计灵敏的电路，以便校正接收机灵敏度的变化。
n. 心灵手巧，独创性；精巧；精巧的装置 同义词:originality, elaboration We harness the skills and ingenuity of the most dynamic country on Earth to reach a better day .我们能利用世界上最具活力的国家的所有技术和聪明才智创造美好的未来。
n. 原料；要素；组成部分 adj. 构成组成部分的 同义词:element, factor, material, basic, essential Molasses is not an easy ingredient to mix into concentrated feeds .糖蜜作为一种饲料成分与精料混合并不容易。
adj. 固有的；内在的；与生俱来的，遗传的 同义词:internal, native, intrinsic, immanent First , you can milk underlying patterns inherent in chaotic systems to make good predictions .首先，你可以抽取混沌系统固有的基本模式，取得良好的预测。
adj. 最初的；字首的 vt. 用姓名的首字母签名 n. 词首大写字母 同义词:premier, original an initialed handkerchief绣有姓名首字母的手帕
adv. 最初，首先；开头 同义词:originally, firstly, primarily Initially , a cold or the flu — even a bad cramp — can cause panic .起初，伤风感冒，甚至严重一点的的痉挛，都能导致恐慌。
vt. 开始，创始；发起；使初步了解 n. 开始；新加入者，接受初步知识者 adj. 新加入的；接受初步知识的 同义词:institute, start in, beginning, threshold, opening, conception, fresh to initiate a reform着手改革
n. 主动权；首创精神 adj. 主动的；自发的；起始的 同义词:pioneering spirit, autonomous, active, spontaneous Will the aid of naval gunfire , the ground troops regained the initiative .我们的地面部队，在海军炮火掩护下，遂将主动权夺回。
vt. 注入；注射 同义词:breathe into, inflood to inject somebody with new drugs给某人注射新药

n. 内地；内陆 adj. 内陆的；内地的；国内的 adv. 在内地；向内地；向内陆；在内陆 同义词:hinterland, outback, internal, domestic, home, inwardly, inclusively But there will still be cheap labour to be found inland and in places like India .但是在一些内陆国家，比如说印度，也仍然能找到廉价的劳动力。
n. 入口，进口；插入物 同义词:threshold, entry, import, portal, way in Close the cold water inlet valve and open a nearby hot water faucet .关闭冷水进水阀，打开附近的热水水龙头。
n. 创新，革新；新方法 同义词:reformation, renovation, renewal An efficient patent system is essential for the promotion of innovation .一个有效的专利系统对于促进革新是必须的。
adj. 无数的，数不清的 同义词:thousand, countless, million, infinite The sum total of innumerable relative truths constitute absolute truth .无数相对的真理之总和，就是绝对的真理。
adj. [无化] 无机的；无生物的 同义词:anorganic, unorganic Most inorganic salts ionize in water solution .大多数无机盐在水溶液中离解。
n. 投入；输入电路 vt. [自][电子] 输入；将…输入电脑 同义词:investment, introjection, type in, carry in The bankruptcy needed much less " public policy " input , not more .破产需要更少的“公共政策”投入，而非更多。
vt. 插入；嵌入 n. 插入物 同义词:bed, build in, inlet, impaler to insert a bookmark into a book把书签插入书中
n. 洞察力；洞悉 同义词:perception, penetration Loop gravity extends this insight into the quantum realm .环圈重力将这个见解援引至量子领域。
adj. 无关紧要的 同义词:indifferent, small-beer On the other hand, even in the pro -whaling countries , whaling is an insignificant and dying industry .另一方面，甚至在“倾捕”的国家里，捕鲸也只是个无足轻重、日薄西山的行业。

adj. 坚持的；迫切的；显著的；引人注目的；紧急的 同义词:consistent, obvious, prominent, urgent, attractive Lawmakers were insistent that bankers not be rescued at the expense of ordinary homeowners and consumers .立法者坚持不应在损害普通住房者及消费者的情况下救援银行。
n. 检查员；巡视员 同义词:supervisor, looker The inspector reproduced a machine surface to a large enough magnification .检验员把机器表面以足够大的放大倍数复现出来。
n. 灵感；鼓舞；吸气；妙计 同义词:stimulation, afflatus Insomnia is my greatest inspiration .失眠是我最大的灵感。
n. 不稳定（性）；基础薄弱；不安定 同义词:flux, imbalance The global system would eliminate a potential source of great instability .全球体系将消除大规模不稳定的一个潜在来源。
n. 安装；分期付款；部分；就职 同义词:setting, proportion, part, percent, portion For a few special import items we can adopt " payment installment ".在一些特殊进口项目中，我们可采用“分期付款”的方式。
adj. 瞬间的；即时的；猝发的 同义词:momentary, flashy A detonation instantaneous pulse of pressure outward in all directions .爆炸的瞬间会朝各个方向发出向外的压力波。
n. 指导书；教员；指导者 同义词:mentor, guider It may help to have an instructor or audio recording to follow .一位指导员或录音来跟着进行也许会有帮助。
adj. 乐器的；有帮助的；仪器的，器械的 n. 器乐曲；工具字，工具格 同义词:helpful, useful, assistant This column leans towards the instrumental approach .本专栏倾向于工具主义方法。
vt. 隔离，使孤立；使绝缘，使隔热 同义词:segregant, quarantine to insulate oneself from the outside world与外部世界隔绝
n. [物] 绝缘体；从事绝缘工作的工人 同义词:isolater, nonconductor It 's for the same reason that a cave stays cool in the middle of summer : The Earth is a remarkable insulator .这和仲夏季节，山洞里仍保持凉爽的原因是一样的：地球是个不同寻常的绝缘体。
n. 摄取量；通风口；引入口；引入的量 同义词:ventilation opening What is your daily intake of calories [ alcohol ] ?你每天摄取的热量[酒精量]是多少?。

adj. 积分的；完整的，整体的 n. 积分；部分；完整 同义词:whole, complete, full, intact, proportion, part, portion, percent, fraction Outsourcing of manufacturing , IT and even research is no longer a passing fashion but integral part of the global production chain .将制造业、IT、甚至研究工作外包，已不再是一种流行风尚，而是全球生产链中不可或缺的一环。

vt. 使…完整；使…成整体；求…的积分；表示…的总和 vi. 求积分；取消隔离；成为一体 adj. 整合的；完全的 n. 一体化；集成体 同义词:become one flesh, complete, absolute, full, total, round, gleichschaltung to integrate the residential blocks with the rest of the college使住宿区与大学其他部分连成一体
n. 完整；正直；诚实；廉正 同义词:truth, honesty, full, righteousness, completeness To maintain the integrity of the whole , these available choices are reciprocal ones .为要保持整体的完整性，这些可用的选择是相对的。
n. 智力，理解力；知识分子；思维逻辑领悟力；智力高的人 同义词:brain, understanding, mind, mentality, head We have an almost uncanny blind spot in our intellect .我们自身的智慧有一个几乎离奇的盲点。
n. 意图；目的；含义 adj. 专心的；急切的；坚决的 同义词:goals, purpose, sake, meaning, will, focused, determined, decided, anxious Even without any ill intent , accidents will happen at sea .即使没有坏的意图，海上也会出现意外事故。
vt. 互相影响；互相作用 vi. 互相影响；互相作用 n. 幕间剧；幕间休息 同义词:entr'acte All things are interrelated and interact on each other.一切事物都互相联系并相互作用。
vt. 使互相连接 vi. 互相联系 In this lab , students identify the serial interfaces on the router and identify and locate the proper cables to interconnect the routers .在本实验中，同学识别路由器上的序列介面，并且识别同时找出适当的缆线来互连路由器。
n. 性交；交往；交流 同义词:society, communication, gender, exchange Fete is one of the commonest intercourse activities in international association .宴请是国际交往中最常见的交际活动之一。
n. 界面；接口；接触面 同义词:limiting surface, boundary surface to interface with the consumer与消费者交流
n. 内部；本质 adj. 内部的；国内的；本质的 同义词:essence, principle, texture, entity, inner, inner, domestic, essential, inside, home Some think he was an interior designer .有人说野口勇是室内设计师。

vi. 起媒介作用 adj. 中间的，中级的 n. [化学] 中间物；媒介 同义词:mid, medium, middle, secondary, medium, intermediary agent The reason is that parts and components from China are important intermediate inputs into US exports .原因是，中国的零部件和组件是美国出口重要的的中间投入。
vt. 说明；口译 vi. 解释；翻译 同义词:say, bring sb to do sth, account, translate to interpret a term解释一个词语
vi. 干涉；调停；插入 同义词:influence in, meddle in to intervene between two objects插入两物体之间
n. 接见，采访；面试，面谈 vt. 采访；接见；对…进行面谈；对某人进行面试 同义词:audience, cover, to receive to interview the president采访总统
n. 声调，语调；语音的抑扬 同义词:parlance The underlined expressions have a rising intonation .划线的部分语调升高。
vt. 介绍；引进；提出；采用 同义词:present, recommend, prefer, file, advance Allow me to introduce a friend to you.让我给你介绍一个朋友。
adj. 无效的；有病的；残废的 n. 病人；残废者 vt. 使伤残；使退役 vi. 变得病弱；因病而奉命退役 同义词:useless, disabled, ineffective, sick, patient to be invalided for life成为终生残疾
adv. 总是；不变地；一定地 同义词:always, toujours The existent condition invariably pleads for itself .目前的处境总会自我开脱的。
adv. 相反地；倒转地 同义词:contrary, counter, backward, conversely The rate of reannealing is inversely proportion to sequence complexity .再退火速度是和顺序复杂性成反比例。
n. 发票；货物；发货单 vt. 开发票；记清单 同义词:cargo, commodity to invoice somebody for the goods给某人开货物发票
n. [化学] 离子 Their expensive lithium- ion battery packs will be leased .他们计划将昂贵的锂离子电池出租。
n. 不规则；无规律；不整齐 同义词:anomaly, abnormity There irregularity in your application .你的申请书不齐全。
adj. 无关的；不考虑的；不顾的 同义词:unrelated, unconcerned Persistence of the herbicide in the mud was irrespective of formulation .除草剂在底泥中的持久性与剂型无关。
n. 灌溉；[临床] 冲洗；冲洗法 同义词:watering Another way to remove wax is known as irrigation .另一个清理耳垢的方法就是冲洗法。
vt. 刺激，使兴奋；激怒 vi. 引起恼怒，引起不愉快 同义词:stimulate, fan, anger, motivate, needle His remarks irritated me a little.他的话让我有点儿恼火。
n. 回教徒；回教；伊斯兰教 同义词:Moslemism, Mohammedanism "All too many Muslims ", he wrote in the Wall Street Journal in 2005 , " fail to grasp Islam .“太多的穆斯林”，2005年他在《华尔街时报》中写道“没有掌握伊斯兰教的真义。”
n. 象牙；乳白色；长牙 adj. 乳白色的；象牙制的 同义词:ivoire, oyster white, milky, opalescent Pouring ivory -white milk over the concoction , Mother smiles to herself.再浇上象牙白的牛奶以后，母亲自顾地笑了。
n. 千斤顶；[电] 插座；男人 vt. 增加；提醒；抬起；用千斤顶顶起某物 adj. 雄的 同义词:boy, he, man, guy, enhance, boost, mount, hot, gain, dog The man tries hard to jack the car,but to no avail.那个男人努力想把汽车顶起来，但他的努力却是徒劳的。
n. 果酱；拥挤；困境；[篮球]扣篮 vt. 使堵塞；挤进，使塞满；混杂；压碎 vi. 堵塞；轧住 He jammed his clothes into a black suitcase.他把衣服塞进了一只黑手提箱。
n. 嫉妒；猜忌；戒备 同义词:envy, green-eyed monster Jealousy is a natural emotion .嫉妒是一种自然的情感。
n. 牛仔裤；[纺] 斜纹棉布 同义词:jea, Milton Keynes Jean : They prepare the dead for burial .他们是为死人准备葬礼。
n. 果冻；胶状物 vi. 成胶状 vt. 使结冻 同义词:agglutinate Waging a war on terror was always going to be like jelly to a wall .以反恐为借口的战争总像往墙壁上放果冻一样站不住脚。
n. 肌肉抽搐；性情古怪的人；蠢人；急拉 vi. 痉挛；急拉；颠簸地行进 vt. 猛拉 同义词:ass, nong, sweep, hoick He carefully jerked a big fish out of water.他小心翼翼地将一条大鱼猛地拉出水面。
n. 耶稣（基督教的创始人）；杰西（男子名） They will celebrate Christmas as the birthday of Jesus Christ .他们将在耶稣基督的生日之时庆祝圣诞。
n. 珠宝（等于jewelry） Although Henry was always expecting to find gold or jewellery or .虽然亨利一直期望自己能发现黄金或珠宝，或是。
vi. 发出叮当声；押韵 vt. 使押韵；使发出叮当声 n. 叮当声 同义词:rhyme, rhyme, clonk, tintinnabulation The bells jingled all the time.铃声一直丁当响个不停。
vt. 慢跑；轻推；蹒跚行进；使颠簸 vi. 慢跑；轻推；蹒跚行进；颠簸着移动 n. 慢跑；轻推，轻撞 同义词:surge, canter, dogging, trot He jogged me with his elbow to give me warning.他用肘轻推我以给我警告。

n. 战神；[天] 火星 同义词:Red Planet The thin atmosphere means Mars gets very cold .大气层稀薄意味着火星十分寒冷。
n. 沼泽；湿地 adj. 沼泽的；生长在沼泽地的 同义词:wetland, cienaga, palustrine, swampy Everyone , it seemed , had an idea as to what was in the marsh that dark night .似乎每个人对在那黑夜沼泽内的物体都有自己的一套看法。
n. 元帅；司仪 vt. 整理；引领；编列 vi. 排列 同义词:officiator, arrange, sort things out, arrange, form He marshaled his facts well.他把事实列举得很好。
vt. 牺牲；折磨；杀害 n. 烈士；殉道者 同义词:harry, worry, trouble, tear Israel would , after all , find it hard if not impossible to winkle out every last rocket and martyr .如果，以色列最后不能找出并消灭所有的火箭弹和殉教者，它就会知难而退。
n. 奇迹 vt. 对…感到惊异 vi. 感到惊讶 同义词:phenomenon, miracle, wonder The policeman gripped the wrist of the invisible hand that collared Marvel .警察抓到了拉住马弗尔衣襟的那只看不见的手。

adj. 男性的；阳性的；男子气概的 n. 男性；阳性，阳性词 同义词:male, positive, mankind, maleness A year ago the ministry of social affairs in the United Arab Emirates (UAE) launched a campaign against " masculine women ".一年以前，阿拉伯联合酋长国社会事务部曾发起一项旨在对抗“男性气概女子”的运动。
vt. 残杀；彻底击败 n. 大屠杀；惨败 同义词:mow down, holocaust, bloodbath News came in of the massacre in Rwanda .关于大屠杀的新闻在卢旺达流行起来。
adj. 大量的；巨大的，厚重的；魁伟的 同义词:huge, extensive, macro, substantial, tremendous, enormous It is a massive issue .这是一个巨大的问题。
n. 桅杆；柱；橡树果实 vt. 在…上装桅杆 A mobile -phone mast is erected in a village .在一个村子里竖了一个手机信号塔。
adj. 成熟的；充分考虑的；到期的；成年人的 vi. 成熟；到期 vt. 使…成熟；使…长成；慎重作出 同义词:developed, adult, due, age, flower She matured earlier than him.她比他成熟得早。
n. 测量；[计量] 度量；尺寸；量度制 同义词:survey, dimension, size Displacement is measurement of the actual changing location of the ground due to shaking .地震位移是用来表示由于震动所产生的地壳实际位置变化。
n. 力学（用作单数）；结构；技术；机械学（用作单数） 同义词:dynamics, technology, configuration, science, framework, skill, texture Do the virtual particles in quantum mechanics really exist ?量子力学中的虚粒子真的存在吗？
n. 机制；原理，途径；进程；机械装置；技巧 同义词:theory, element, technique, skill, machinery Think of the mechanism as a lock .把这个机理想像为一把锁。
vt. 考虑；计划；企图 vi. 冥想；沉思 同义词:schedule, propose, design, map, view, be deep in thought, be buried in It was only to sit in his own rooms in a neighbouring hotel and meditate .那不过是要坐在附近旅馆他自己的房间里沉思默想罢了。
adj. 忧郁的；使人悲伤的 n. 忧郁；悲哀；愁思 同义词:blue, dark, sadness, doldrums This is a melancholy scene .这是一个令人悲伤的情景。
n. 旋律；歌曲；美妙的音乐 同义词:song, cantus It is a melody that he sings to you .他唱给你的是一个美的旋律。
n. 资格；成员资格；会员身分 同义词:qualification, capacity To do so would be to deny Greece one of the privileges of membership .因为假如拒绝，将是对希腊作为欧盟成员之一的特权的否定。
n. 威胁；恐吓 vi. 恐吓；进行威胁 vt. 威胁；恐吓 同义词:threat, danger, to threaten, cow, to threaten The purpose of all the menace , most people think , is to intimidate the opposition .多数人认为，这些威慑无非就是为了恐吓反对派。
vt. 修理，修补；改善；修改 vi. 改善，好转 n. 好转，改进；修补处 同义词:improve, repair, doctor, modify, change for the better, polish up, reforming, improvement in Can you mend this broken chair?你能修理这把破椅子吗?
n. 商品；货物 vt. 买卖；推销 vi. 经商 同义词:goods, cargo, promote, sell, handle, trade in, do business However, world merchandise trade was still twice that of world economic growth (GDP).世界商品贸易依然是全球经济增长的二倍。
adj. 仁慈的；慈悲的；宽容的 同义词:kind, humane How can a merciful God permit a human being to suffer such torment ?仁慈的上帝怎么容许一个人受这样的痛苦？
n. 水银；水银柱；精神 同义词:energy, spirit, soul, mind, genius Parachutes lowered the Mercury spacecraft to the ocean surface .降落伞将“水星”号航天器降落到海面。
n. 优点，价值；功绩；功过 vt. 值得 vi. 应受报答 同义词:asset, importance, virtue, price, value, to be worth, be deserving of He merited all the praises they give him.他们给他的所有表扬他都受之无愧。
n. 网眼；网丝；圈套 vi. 相啮合 vt. [机] 啮合；以网捕捉 同义词:web, trap, joggle This toothed wheel should be meshed with that one.这个齿轮应该与那个相吻合。

n. 混乱；食堂，伙食团；困境；脏乱的东西 vt. 弄乱，弄脏；毁坏；使就餐 vi. 把事情弄糟；制造脏乱；玩弄 同义词:difficulty, disorder, chaos, confusion, corner, destroy, soil, mud, spot, damage, play fast and loose, toy with See how your cat has messed up my ball of wool.瞧你的猫把我的绒线球弄乱了。
n. 消息；差使；启示；预言；广告词 vi. 报信，报告；[通信] 报文 vt. 通知 同义词:news, prediction, word, inform of, report to, give notice, instruct, advise of The myth is the message .而神话，也就是寓言。
adj. 金属的，含金属的 同义词:metal bearing metallic gaskets can be made from many different materials .非金属衬垫可以由许多不同材料制成。
n. 冶金；冶金学；冶金术 Abstract : Rotary mixer is used in mixing and granulating si nter for ferrous and nonferrous metallurgy .文摘：圆筒混合机主要用于钢铁和有色金属冶炼烧结物料的混合和制粒作业。

adj. 大都市的；大主教辖区的；宗主国的 n. 大城市人；大主教；宗主国的公民 同义词:suzerain, archbishop The events of 9/11 were commemorated from coast to coast , from religions services metropolitan cathedrals to makeshift memorials in small towns .从东海岸到西海岸，从大城市教堂的宗教活动到小镇的临时纪念仪式，人们都在纪念9/11事件。
n. [计] 微处理器 同义词:Merced For this reason , this technique is almost never used microprocessor .由于这个原因，微处理器几乎不使用这种技术。
adj. 微观的；用显微镜可见的 My taste buds look something like microscopic rose buds .我的味蕾在显微镜下有点象玫瑰花蕾。
n. 微波 同义词:wavelet Never microwave egg in the shell.勿将带壳的鸡蛋放入微波炉内加热。

adj. 有力的；强有力的；有势力的 adv. 很；极；非常 n. 有势力的人 同义词:powerful, male, influential, vigorous, energetic, greatly, quite, badly, too, extremely, far, highly, big guns IN THE 15th century China possessed a mighty navy of " treasure fleets ".在15世纪中国拥有一支强大的海军——“宝船舰队”。
vi. 移动；随季节而移居；移往 vt. 使移居；使移植 同义词:to move, to shift, transplant Wealthy people often migrate in winter to warmer sunnier countries.有钱人冬天常移居到天气较暖和的、阳光更充足的国家。
adj. 温和的；轻微的；淡味的；文雅的；不含有害物质的的 n. （英国的一种）淡味麦芽啤酒 同义词:pacific, gentle, moderate, soft, slight " Mild indifference " probably sums up best her colleagues ' attitudes to Louise .“适度的冷淡”大概最能概括她同事对路易斯的态度。
adj. 乳白色的；牛奶的；乳状的；柔和的；混浊不清的 同义词:female, delicate A few , however , are real whoppers— the products of events far more powerful than occur in the Milky Way.然而，它们中有少数的确是不容忽视的，星体的产物远比银河系里的更有力量。
n. 百万富翁；大富豪 adj. 100万以上人口的 同义词:multimillionaire, Croesus If she saw a goldfinch , she would marry a millionaire .如果她看到一只金翅雀，则可能嫁给一位百万富翁。
vi. 混合；交往 vt. 使混合；使相混 同义词:travel, company, sort, associate, composite, babelize She looked at him, love and disgust mingled on her face.她望着他，脸上露出爱与恨交织的表情。
adj. 微型的，小规模的 n. 缩图；微型画；微型图画绘画术 vt. 是…的缩影 同义词:petty, small-scale, contracted drawing, microcosm This plane model miniatures the airplane.这个飞机模型是飞机的缩影。
vt. 使减到最少；小看，极度轻视 vi. 最小化 We had about ten hours' warning, so we were able to minimize the effects of the flood.由于在十小时前发出了警报，我们能够把水灾的破坏减至最低程度。
n. 薄荷；[金融] 造币厂，巨款 vt. 铸造，铸币 同义词:menta, peppermint, coin to mint material wealth创造物质财富
n. 镜子；真实的写照；榜样 vt. 反射；反映 同义词:example, lead, glass, image, echo The glory of the mornig is mirrored in the sea.朝霞映在海面上。
n. 守财奴；吝啬鬼；（石油工程上用的）凿井机 同义词:screw, pinchfist Greed is a miser 's preponderant characteristic .贪婪是一个守财奴的主要特点。
n. 痛苦，悲惨；不幸；苦恼；穷困 同义词:smart, disaster, hurt, evil, grief War misery and ruin .战争造成苦难和毁坏。
n. 不幸；灾祸，灾难 同义词:disaster, evil, tragedy, grief He is unfortunate who cannot bear misfortune .不能忍受不幸的人是可怜的人。
adj. 传教的；传教士的 n. 传教士 同义词:Boanerges, preacher His coat was a good one, and his black tie was a gift from a kind missionary on Thanksgiving Day .他的西装上衣算蛮好的，他那条黑领带是感恩节那天一个好心的传教士送给他的礼物。
n. 薄雾；视线模糊不清；模糊不清之物 vi. 下雾；变模糊 vt. 使模糊；使蒙上薄雾 同义词:gauze, fog, fog, obfuscate The hills misted over.小山笼罩在薄雾中。
n. 情妇；女主人；主妇；女教师；女能人 同义词:other woman, moll Let him leave the house, if he imagines he will not harmonize with its young mistress .如果他认为他不能与府第的年轻女主人和睦相处，让他离开府第好了。
n. 露指手套；连指手套 Up through the snow appeared a badger . He eyed the mitten and began to climb in.当雪地里出现獾时，它看见这支手套并开始想往里面钻。
n. 混合器；搅拌器；[电子] 混频器 同义词:commingler, hybrider Unique name of the Zone Return Plenum or Zone Mixer component .区域回风静压箱或区域混合器组件的唯一标识名。
n. 暴民，暴徒；民众；乌合之众 vt. 大举包围，围攻；蜂拥进入 vi. 聚众生事，聚众滋事 同义词:mass, clamjamfry, beleaguer The shop was mobbed by a large crowd.这家商店遭到一大群人的袭击。
vt. 动员，调动；集合，组织；使…流通；使…松动 vi. 组织；动员起来 同义词:organize, remove, structure, form to mobilize the army in an emergency紧急状态下动员军队

vt. 嘲弄；模仿；使…失望；使…无效 vi. 嘲弄，嘲笑 n. 嘲弄；仿制品；嘲笑对象 adj. 模拟的；假装的；伪造的 adv. 虚伪地 同义词:guy, simulate, pattern, imitate, make game of, jeer at, derisiveness, imitation, affected, false, assumed, simulate, lyingly, falsely She mocked him as a country boy.她嘲笑他是个乡下孩子。
adv. 适度地；中庸地；有节制地 同义词:reasonably, temperately She should moderate her language when children are present.在孩子面前，她说话应该节制。
n. 谦逊；质朴；稳重 同义词:humility, humbleness Modesty is not his long suit .谦虚可不是他的长处。

n. 修改，修正；改变 同义词:correction, alteration, changing, revision AMERICAN policymakers have long held that mortgage modification is one of the best ways to tackle the country 's housing bust .一直以来，美国立法者都认为修订抵押贷款是应对其房市低迷最有效的方法之一。
vt. 调节；（信号）调制；调整 vi. 调制；转调 同义词:regulate, coordinate She has a very monotonous voice; she should have it modulated.她的声音很单调，应该加以调整。
n. [计] 模块；组件；模数 同义词:component, ActiveX Component ActiveX I am in a test module for living in space .我待的这个小屋实际上是一个太空生活试验舱。
adj. [化学] 分子的；由分子组成的 In line with this idea , molecular hydrogen was not found in complex C .与此观念相较，复合体C内并未发现氢分子的踪影。
adj. 瞬间的；短暂的；随时会发生的 同义词:brief, little, passing, transient, instantaneous But if it is fair to call that a momentary mis-step, it was soon put right.如果说，布什当时的选择充其量只是一时失误，那么事后证明确实如此。
n. 君主，帝王；最高统治者 同义词:emperor, sovereignty Overall , a monarch butterfly is no more or less striking than its host , the milkweed pod.大体上，帝王蝴蝶和其宿主奶草豆荚谁也不比谁更显眼或更平庸。
n. 僧侣，修道士；和尚 同义词:religious, monastery Tako- NYODU - Japanese : a baldy , literally an " octopus monk ".日语：一个秃子，字面义为一只“章鱼和尚”。
n. 垄断；垄断者；专卖权 同义词:cornerer In October a consortium controlled by the guard bought 51% of Iran's telecoms monopoly .今年十月，由卫队控制的一个财团买入了伊朗电信巨头51%的股份。
n. 怪物；巨人，巨兽；残忍的人 adj. 巨大的，庞大的 同义词:giant, bugbear, huge, enormous, tremendous, massive, macro Just before I got there , I saw monster running through the trees .就在我到那之前，我看到那个怪物跑过了树林。
adj. 巨大的；怪异的；荒谬的；畸形的 同义词:huge, tremendous, enormous, massive, macro Its monstrous wings seem to wheel in the leaden air around me .它那怕人的翅膀仿佛在我周围沉重的空气中旋转。
vt. 系住；使停泊 n. 沼泽；荒野 同义词:bend on, wild, cienaga She moored her boat alongside ours.她把她的船停靠在我们船边。
vt. 擦干；用拖把拖洗 vi. 用拖把擦洗地板；扮鬼脸 n. 拖把；蓬松的头发；鬼脸 同义词:make faces, pull faces, Mops, swabber I mop the kitchen floor twice a week.我一星期两次用拖把拖厨房的地板。
n. 道德；品行，美德 同义词:virtue, excellence Distance is representative of " others " which means morality .距离便是“他人”，而“他人”即社会公德。
vt. 抵押 n. 抵押 同义词:hold in pledge, hypothecate, hypothecation, pledge My father's business is failing; he's mortgaged all his assets so as to save it.我父亲的企业在亏损，他抵押了所有资产试图挽救它。
adj. 穆斯林的；伊斯兰教的；回教的 n. 穆斯林；穆罕默德信徒；伊斯兰 同义词:Islamic, Muslim, Muslim, Moorman A high officer in a Moslem government, especially in the Ottoman Empire .土耳其帝国一个地区或省市的长官。
n. 清真寺 The mosque debate was a moment for a speech of that kind .清真寺辩论也本是发表这种演讲的好时机。
n. 苔藓；泥沼 vt. 使长满苔藓 同义词:mire A raft of sea otters are at play in a narrow estuary at Moss Landing, near Santa Cruz , Calif .在加州圣克鲁兹附近的莫斯兰汀地区，有一个狭窄的海湾。
n. 汽车旅馆 Consider staying at a motel , or buy groceries and cook your own meals .考虑一下在汽车旅馆呆着，或者去杂货铺买些东西自己做饭。
n. 动机，目的；主题 adj. 发动的；成为动机的 vt. 使产生动机，激起 同义词:incentive, goals, intention, topic, purpose, prompt, stir up He had some motive in telling this fable .他讲这寓言故事是有用意的。
n. 高速公路，汽车高速公路 同义词:expressway, freeway He picked up two hitchhiker s at the entrance to the motorway .在高速公路入口，他让两个免费搭车旅行者搭了他的车。
vt. 增加；爬上；使骑上马 vi. 爬；上升 n. 山峰；底座；乘骑用马 同义词:enhance, boost, jack, hot, gain, climb, arise, raise, go up, peak, foundation plate to mount the mountain登上山
adj. 多山的；巨大的；山一般的 同义词:huge, tremendous, enormous, massive, macro Such tactics cannot be contemplated in a country as mountainous and rural as Afghanistan .但，到了阿富汗，多山，城市少，同样的战术就很难取得预期效果了。
n. 移动；步骤；迁居 vi. 移动；搬家，迁移；离开 vt. 移动；感动 同义词:removal, shift, procedure, motion, migration, remove, leave, split, remove, put, affect That chair is in the way, move it please.那把椅子挡着道，请把它搬开。
n. [数] 乘法；增加 同义词:enhancement, increase, gain, rise A commonly used microcomputer algorithm for multiplication .微型计算机一种常用的乘法算法。
n. 群众；多数 同义词:majority, mass But ratings can cover multitude of sins .但是投资等级也能涵盖众多过失。

adj. 市政的，市的；地方自治的 同义词:civic, communalistic It is an advanced technique of municipal wastewater , organic industry wastewater treatment and phosphorus removal in wastewater .这是一种城市污水处理、有机工业废水处理和污水除磷的先进技术。
n. 低语；低语声；低声抱怨；潺潺声 vi. 低声说；私下抱怨；发出轻柔持续的声音 vt. 低声说 同义词:whispering, susurrus, breathe The stream is murmuring.溪水潺潺。
adj. 肌肉的；肌肉发达的；强健的 同义词:robust, intramuscular This is an entirely sufficient energy source for such intermittent muscular tasks as walking or running .对于像走路或跑步这样断断续续的有关肌肉的活动这是完全充足的能量来源。
n. 沉思；冥想 vt. 沉思；沉思地说 vi. 沉思；凝望 同义词:reflection, meditation, meditate on, be deep in thought, meditate on, be deep in thought She mused on what she has heard.她仔细考虑自己听到的事。
n. 芥末；芥菜；深黄色；强烈的兴趣 同义词:dark yellow, deep yellow This mustard does not bite much .这种芥末不很辣。
adj. 哑的；沉默的；无声的 vt. 减弱……的声音；使……柔和 n. 哑巴；弱音器；闭锁音 同义词:silent, dumb, sordino, sourdine to play the violin with muted strings演奏加了弱音器的小提琴
n. 神秘，秘密；奥秘；神秘的事物 同义词:secret, privacy, confidence SEX is a mystery —and not just to those who indulge in it.性是一个谜——这里的迷并不仅仅是对那些沉迷其中者而言。
n. 餐巾；餐巾纸；尿布 同义词:serviette, mokador Pork entered the room, bearing a plate , silver and napkin .波克手里拿着一个盘子、一副刀叉和一条餐巾进来了。
n. 叙述，讲述；故事 同义词:relation, statement, story, telling, tale The richness of his novel comes from his narration of it.他小说的丰富多采得益于他的叙述。
adj. [数] 负的；消极的；否定的；阴性的 n. 否定；负数；[摄] 底片 vt. 否定；拒绝 同义词:passive, destructive, infirmation, disaffirmation, deny, refuse He negatived it was true.他否认这件事是真的。
adj. 微不足道的，可以忽略的 同义词:bit, inappreciable Such terms would be negligible in the early universe but would speed expansion later on .这些项在宇宙早期可以被忽略，而在后来则可以用来加速膨胀。
vt. 谈判，商议；转让；越过 vi. 谈判，交涉 同义词:transfer, surmount, transact I'd like to negotiate about the distributional plan with you.我愿意与你协商一下分配方案。
adj. 邻近的；附近的；接壤的 同义词:adjacent, surrounding Two countries are neighbouring if their boundaries have an edge in common .如果两个国家的边界有公共边，则说它们是相邻的。
n. 巢，窝；安乐窝；温床 vt. 筑巢；嵌套 vi. 筑巢；找鸟巢 同义词:soil, eyrie, nidificate He nested himself near his field.他在地边搭了个窝篷。
n. 网；网络；净利；实价 vi. 编网 vt. 得到；净赚；用网捕 adj. 纯粹的；净余的 同义词:network, web, harvest, come into, pure, whole to net one's son a cap给儿子织一顶帽子
n. 网络；广播网；网状物 同义词:net, meshwork His business lunches were taken up with networking.他的交际午餐被用来建立与客户的交流。
n. [核] 中子 Perhaps nuclear reactions , such as neutron capture ?也许是某种核反应，例如，中子捕获？
adj. 精密的；美好的；细微的；和蔼的 同义词:precision, exact, narrow, kind, benign I once dreamed a very nice dream .我曾做了一个非常好的梦。
n. 镍；镍币；五分镍币 vt. 镀镍于 同义词:Ni, medio The same seems to be happening with aluminium , lead and nickel .相同的现象估计也会发生在铝、铅和镍的身上。
n. 绰号；昵称 vt. 给……取绰号；叫错名字 同义词:sobriquet, agname We always nickname him “Little Lazy Cat”.我们总是叫他的绰号“小懒猫”。

n. 恶梦；梦魇般的经历 adj. 可怕的；噩梦似的 同义词:paroniria, oneirodynia, terrible, horrible, awesome, fearful, dire The film starts with an intentionally disturbing nightmare sequence involving a pack of rabid dogs , which represents the invasion .影片有意以扰乱的噩梦情境为开端，梦境中包括一群象征着入侵的狂犬。
vt. 推荐；提名；任命；指定 同义词:install, constitute, name, place, specify He was nominated for the MP.他被提名为议员候选人。
n. 规范，基准；定额，分配之工作量 同义词:criterion, quota The problem with the anti- littering campaign then is that its descriptive norm is counterproductive to norm .因此，反乱丢垃圾运动的问题在于描写型规范会产生于规定型规范相反的结果。
n. 正常化；标准化；正规化；常态化 同义词:standardization, formalisation to normalize the spare parts使零配件标准化
adj. 向北的 n. 北方 adv. 向北 同义词:norward, nord Since then they have spread northward and all the way to the West Coast .自那以后它们扩展到了北部以及通往西海岸所有道路。
n. 鼻子；嗅觉；突出的部分；探问 vt. 嗅；用鼻子触 vi. 小心探索着前进；探问 同义词:smell, boko, smell, snuff at, ask after His dog nosed me,then let me go in.他的狗闻了闻我，然后放我进去了。
adj. 值得注意的，显著的；著名的 n. 名人，显要人物 同义词:famous, obvious, remarkable, prominent, marked, personality, lion, celebrity But I think the launches are notable for a number of reasons .但我认为，出于许多原因，这些基金的推出值得关注。
adj. 著名的；显著的；附有乐谱的 v. 注意；记下（note的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:famous, obvious, prominent, marked, outstanding to note a case对一桩案子做笔录
vt. 通告，通知；公布 同义词:message, post, publish I have notified them to watch and tail him.我已通知了他们监视跟踪他。

n. 概念；见解；打算 同义词:concept, idea, eye, construct, sight When talking politics , however , the French , like the Americans , tend to go for the more formal notion of justice .在谈论政治的时候，然而，法国人像美国人一样，倾向于用公正这种更加正式的说法。

adj. 声名狼藉的，臭名昭著的 同义词:infamous, disreputable They are notorious for lending people umbrellas when the sun is shining and asking for them back when rain starts to fall.其昭然行径犹如于光天烈日底下向人们出借雨伞却在积云将雨时要人把伞还去。
adv. 尽管，仍然 prep. 尽管，虽然 conj. 虽然 同义词:still, toujours, in spite of, in despite of, although, while, though, as, albeit He still went home, notwithstanding the midnight.尽管已近午夜，他还是回家去了。
n. [数] 零；没有 同义词:absence, nothing We must bring their schemes nought .我们必须使他们的阴谋彻底破产。
vt. 滋养；怀有；使健壮 同义词:harbor to nourish a baby by milk用牛奶喂养婴儿
n. 食物；营养品；滋养品 同义词:nutrition, diet, eating But it is too late to try for strength now through nourishment .不过要想靠营养来增强力气，如今已经太晚了。
adj. 新奇的；异常的 n. 小说 同义词:patent, exquisite, story, fiction He wove three plots (together) into novel .他把三个情节编织成一部小说。
n. 新奇；新奇的事物；新颖小巧而廉价的物品 同义词:newness, originality Riding was novelty to her .骑马对她来说是件新鲜事。
n. 核，核心；原子核 同义词:core, quick These young people formed the nucleus of the club .这些年轻人形成了俱乐部的核心。
n. 数；（杂志等的）期；号码；数字；算术 vi. 计入；总数达到 vt. 编号；计入；数…的数目；使为数有限 同义词:figure, arithmetic, digital, control No., code name to number the pages编页码
adj. 数值的；数字的；用数字表示的（等于numeric） 同义词:digital Budgeting is the formulation of plans for a given future period in numerical terms .预算是用数字的形式来表示将来某一确定期间的计划。
n. 修女，尼姑 同义词:sister, religious nun took strait vows .那位修女立下严格的誓愿。
n. 苗圃；托儿所；温床 同义词:soil, nest A lover's hope resembles the bean in the nursery tale , -let it once take root , and it will grow so rapidly .情人的希望宛如童话中讲的那颗豆子--一旦它生了根，就会飞速地成长。
n. 螺母，螺帽；坚果；难对付的人，难解的问题 vi. 采坚果 同义词:nutsert, female screw He 's surely a hard nut , nobody likes approaching him .他确实是一个难对付的人，没有人喜欢接近他。
n. 桨；橹；桨手 vt. 划（船） vi. 划行 同义词:rower, yuloh, gondole to oar the English Channel划过英吉利海峡
n. 誓言，誓约；诅咒，咒骂 同义词:pledge, asseveration The judge reminded the witness that he was oath .法官提醒证人，他是发过誓的。
n. 顺从；服从；遵守 同义词:keeping, submission He cowed his wife obedience .他恐吓他妻子以顺从他。
adj. 顺从的，服从的；孝顺的 同义词:followed, subject, compliant, submissive High -level Philippine housekeepers are diligent and obedient .菲律宾高级家政人员很敬业，不摆谱。

adj. 客观的；目标的；宾格的 n. 目的；目标；[光] 物镜；宾格 同义词:impersonal, accusatival, intention, purpose, sake, target, goal Objective To study the relationship between bronchial asthma and tuberculin reaction .目的研究支气管哮喘与结核菌素反应之间的关系。
n. 义务；职责；债务 同义词:debt, liability The obligation of cohabitation of spouses is the basis of marital rights .夫妻间的同居义务是夫妻其他权利与义务的基础。
vt. 迫使；强制；赐，施恩惠；责成 vi. 帮忙；施恩惠 同义词:pressure, enforce The principal shall be obliged to pay the wages to the employees.必须责成雇主向雇员支付薪金。
adj. 模糊的；晦涩的；昏暗的 vt. 遮掩；使变暗；使难理解 同义词:fuzzy, dark, vague, lowering, overcurtain, becloud The moon was obscured by clouds.月亮被云朵遮掩了。
n. 观察；监视；观察报告 同义词:view, monitoring, surveillance, watch The careful observation and inference was his daily work .他的日常工作便是仔细的观察和诊断。
vt. 观察；遵守；说；注意到；评论 vi. 观察；说；注意到；评论 同义词:watch, quo, tell, talk, respect, look into, take stock of It was observed by none.没有人看见这件事。
adj. 顽固的；倔强的；难以控制的 同义词:resistant, stubborn The reservoir in the reserved preserve is an obstacle to the obstinate observer .预留保护区内的蓄水库对固执的观察者是一个障碍。

n. 发生；出现；事件；发现 同义词:emergence, going on, event, discovery, appearance, circumstance, scene The question of virus occurrence and survival in sediments was addressed only after improved detection methods were at hand.淤泥中病毒发生和存活的问题只有在改进了检测方法以后，才能够得以了解。
n. 犯罪；违反；过错；攻击 同义词:crime, attempt, attack, violation, guilt Then other neighbours , most of them newcomers , took offence at his horses roaming on their properties.随后其他邻居，大部分是新搬来的，攻击他的进入他们地里的马。
adj. 攻击的；冒犯的；无礼的；讨厌的 n. 攻势；攻击 同义词:evil, rank, attack, attempt, push The Syria 's president called Israel 's offensive " a war crime ".叙利亚总统称以色列的进攻是一次战争犯罪。
vt. 提供；出价；试图 n. 提议；出价；意图；录取通知书 vi. 提议；出现；献祭；求婚 同义词:afford, undertake, try, tender, lend, proposal, intention, meaning, will, bid, occur, figure, come out He offered me a glass of wine.他给了我一杯葡萄酒。
n. 抵消，补偿；平版印刷；支管 vt. 抵消；弥补；用平版印刷术印刷 vi. 装支管 同义词:compensation, indemnity, kill, recover The gains offset the losses.收支相抵。
n. 后代，子孙；产物 同义词:child, creation, fruit, seed The program generated offspring of a current form , each with slight differences .程序生成一个现有形态的后代，每一代都略有不同。
n. 欧姆（电阻单位） This law is known as Ohm 's law.这个定律通称为欧姆定律。
n. 橄榄；橄榄树；橄榄色 adj. 橄榄的；橄榄色的 同义词:Olive Tree The olive tree deeply stirs the emotions of Palestinians .橄榄树深深地激荡起巴勒斯坦人的情感。

adj. 向前的；前进的 adv. 向前；在前面 同义词:forward, ahead, advancing, ongoing, forth, to, ahead, along, front In life 's earnest battle they only prevail , who daily march onward and never say fail.在人生最重要的战场上，只有坚持前进、永不言败的人才能获得最终的胜利。
adj. 不透明的；不传热的；迟钝的 n. 不透明物 vt. 使不透明；使不反光 同义词:slow, non-transparent, devitrify Most importantly the corporate governance structure opaque .最重要的是，公司治理结构不透明。
n. 操作；经营；[外科] 手术；[数][计] 运算 同义词:work, manipulation After working with Operation Smile for a while .在“微笑行动”工作了一段时间后。
n. 鸦片；麻醉剂 adj. 鸦片的 同义词:meconium, detoxicator Depending on the era that you were here , it had prostitution , certainly saloons , and at one time , even opium .要看你在哪个时代到这里来，这里有卖淫的，当然也有酒吧。有一个时期，甚至还有鸦片。

adj. 光学的；眼睛的，视觉的 同义词:visual, ocular But at each end of the fibre , optical signals must be converted to and from the electrical signals that computers use to process information .但在纤维的各端，必须将光信号转换成电信号或者将电信号转换成光信号，计算机用电信号处理信息。
n. 乐观；乐观主义 Optimism is an intellectual choice .乐观是一个明智的选择。
adj. 最适宜的 n. 最佳效果；最适宜条件 You must try to find your own . Every day you study , bear this principle of the optimum in mind .你应尽力去发现你自己的最佳点，每天学习时要把这个最适度的原则记在心上。
n. [计] 选项；选择权；买卖的特权 同义词:election, choice Pick an option , any option .挑一个选择，任何一个。
n. 果园；果树林 同义词:grove Be there an orchard behind her house ?有没有一个果园在她房子后面？
n. 管弦乐队；乐队演奏处 Bill can play the piano , sing and lead his orchestra all at once.比尔能够同时弹钢琴、唱歌和领导他的管弦乐队。
adv. 通常地；一般地 同义词:commonly, normally, currently, generally Mr. Slope 's civility had been more than ordinarily greasy .斯洛普先生的礼仪比平日更为谄媚。
vt. 使适应；确定方向；使朝东 n. 东方；东方诸国 adj. 东方的 vi. 向东 同义词:adapt, condition, suit, season, east, eastern, to the east We must orient our work to the needs of the markets.我们必须调整我们的工作，以适应市场的需要。
n. 方向；定向；适应；情况介绍；向东方 同义词:aspect, way, quarter, guiding, adaptation In their new orientation , these patterns will still have the supersaturated vibrancy of father power .按新的方向时，它们依然是具有超强渗透力的“父亲力量”活性。
vt. 引起；创作 vi. 发源；发生；起航 同义词:attract, produce, cause, occasion, operate, happen, occur, proceed The film originated from a novel.这部电影源自一部小说。
n. 装饰；[建][服装] 装饰物；教堂用品 vt. 装饰，修饰 同义词:decoration, adornment, paint, hang, modify, bedeck to ornament the house with flowers and colour lights用鲜花和彩灯装饰房屋
adj. 装饰的，装饰性的 n. 观赏植物；装饰品 同义词:decorative, illuminative, decoration, trimming European elm with lustrous smooth leaves ornamental .欧洲榆，有光亮、平滑的叶片，用作观赏植物。
adv. 否则；另外；在其他方面 adj. 另外的；其他方面的 同义词:else, extra, another, elsewise Otherwise , she might be in her tomb today !否则，她今天就会在坟墓里了！
aux. 应该，应当；大概 vi. 应该，应当；大概 同义词:should, must, would have, be supposed to All of us ought to go.我们大家都应该去。

n. （战争的）爆发；（疾病的）发作 vi. 爆发 同义词:explosion, burst, fit, burst, blow up One is food security , another is climate change and the third is the threat of a worldwide outbreak of influenza .其中之一是食品安全另一个是气候变化第三个是全世界范围流感爆发的威胁。
n. 结果，结局；成果 同义词:product, result, conclusion, event, feedback Outcome differences .结果不同。
adj. 最外面的；最远的 同义词:outmost, farthermost Except for the transitional elements , valency electrons are in outermost electron shell.除去过渡元素外，价电子位于最外面的电子层。
n. 歹徒；罪犯；亡命之徒；被剥夺法律保护者 vt. 宣布…为不合法；将…放逐；剥夺…的法律保护 同义词:gangster, plug-ugly to outlaw an illegal organization取缔非法组织
n. 出口，排放孔；[电] 电源插座；销路；发泄的方法；批发商店 同义词:exit, market, way out But that discontent has yet to find an outlet .但是这种不满尚未找到一条发泄途径。

adj. 外面的，外部的；外来的 n. 外部；外观 adv. 在外面，向外面；在室外 prep. 在…范围之外 同义词:outer, external, out, without, surface, face, garment, without, ectad, beyond the pale to run outside the house跑向屋外

adj. 椭圆的；卵形的 n. 椭圆形；卵形 同义词:elliptical, ovate, ellipse, elliptical shape Callout with oval outline and pointer from center of text block . Control handles adjust width and height .从文本块中央引出的具有椭圆轮廓线和指针的标注。控制手柄可调整宽度和高度。

adv. 结束；越过；从头到尾 prep. 越过；在…之上；遍于…之上 adj. 结束的；上面的 vt. 越过 同义词:all up, upon, onto, beyond, past, up, ended, upper, closing, past, concluding, negotiate, surmount The helicopter is staying over our heads.那架直升机就在我们头顶的上方。
adj. 全部的；全体的；一切在内的 adv. 全部地；总的说来 n. 工装裤；罩衫 同义词:entire, all, corporate, total, universal, outright, jeans, jea Overall , however , it makes the most money .但总体看来，它赚了最多的钱。
vt. 对……评价过高；对……估计过高 n. 估计过高；评价过高；出价过高 vi. 估计过高；评价过高 to overestimate an old piece of furniture过高地估价一件旧家具
vi. 溢出；泛滥；充溢 n. 充满，洋溢；泛滥；超值；溢值 vt. 使溢出；使泛滥；使充溢 同义词:spill over, flow over, filled with, fresh, flood, flow, fullness, spill Several farms were overflown.有几块农田被淹没了。
vi. 悬垂；逼近 vt. 悬于…之上；（危险、邪恶等）逼近 n. （船首或船尾）突出部分；悬垂部分 同义词:close in upon, push up to, close in upon, push up to, projecting part A large lamp overhangs the hall.大厅上吊着一盏大灯。
vt. 无意中听到；偷听 vi. 无意中听到；偷听到 同义词:happen to hear, listen in on Pay attention to overhear our talk!注意，有人在偷听咱们的谈话!
n. 重叠；重复 vi. 部分重叠；部分的同时发生 vt. 与…重叠；与…同时发生 同义词:repeat, segistration Two old trees overlapped their upper branches.那两棵古树的上端分枝相互交搭复生。
vt. 超载，超过负荷 n. 超载；负荷过多 同义词:superimposed load, surcharge The electrical system in your house would be overloaded if you used too many electric home appliances at once.如果你同时使用许多家用电器的话，你家里的电力系统就会超载。
vt. 忽略；俯瞰；远眺；检查；高耸于…之上 n. 忽视；眺望 同义词:forget, examine, survey, review, inspect, inobservancy, negligence The important details were overlooked by them,很重要的细节都被他们忽略掉了。
adv. 在海外，海外 adj. 海外的，国外的 同义词:beyond the sea, transmarine, off-shore For overseas markets , the process may call for a modified product .在海外市场，这一过程有时要求对产品进行改进。
vt. 赶上；压倒；突然来袭 vi. 超车 同义词:catch up with, to catch up, cut in We managed to overtake the last train.我们设法赶上了末班火车。
n. 推翻；倾覆；瓦解 vt. 推翻；打倒；倾覆 同义词:capsizal, disintegration, floor, fell The tyrant was overthrown.暴君被打倒了。
vt. 压倒；淹没；受打击 同义词:flood, flow We overwhelmed the enemy by superior forces.我们以优势兵力打垮了敌军。
adj. 压倒性的；势不可挡的 v. 压倒；淹没（overwhelm的ing形式）；制服 同义词:inundatory, preponderant, drowning Security forces kept overwhelming force on their side.安全部队保持着他们压倒性的优势。

adj. 可怜的，悲哀的；感伤的；乏味的 同义词:poor, sad, melting, stupid But Mr Carey pulls the pathetic fallacy out of the hat with panache .但是凯里用华丽的辞藻把可怜的假象展现在了眼前。

adj. 爱国的 To commemorate a great patriotic poet of China : Qu Yuan .是为了纪念中国伟大的爱国诗人：屈原。

adj. 垂直的，正交的；直立的；陡峭的 n. 垂线；垂直的位置 同义词:vertical, standing, orthogonal If the first axis is perpendicular to the ground we speak of an azimuthal mounting.如果第一根轴与地面垂直，就称为地平式支架。

vi. 坚持；不屈不挠；固执己见（在辩论中） 同义词:stay, stand on If you persevere with the work, you'll succeed in the end.你如果把工作坚持下去，最终会取得成功的。

adj. [电子] 光电的 同义词:electro-optic If a object that is moving is the target and comes into the position determined by the photoelectric detector , we get a pulse photoelectric detector .目标识别与定位光电探测器可以探测被选为目标的物体是否运动到指定位置，如果是，就输出一个脉冲信号。

adj. 虔诚的；敬神的；可嘉的；尽责的 同义词:religious, good Some secular Americans voice the opposite complaint : that Mormons are too pious and too likely to knock on your door.一些世俗主义美国人也发出反对的声音，他们抱怨摩门教徒太过虔诚，并且极有可能会登门拜访。

adj. 平的；简单的；朴素的；清晰的 n. 平原；无格式；朴实无华的东西 adv. 清楚地；平易地 同义词:simple, defined, plane, flatland, puszta, definitely, fair, expressly The pavement thus laid is to be plained and polished.这样铺的路面需要弄平弄光滑。

vt. 使丰满；使鼓起；突然放下 adv. 沉重地；突然地 vi. 变丰满；鼓起 adj. 圆胖的，丰满的；鼓起的 n. 扑通声 同义词:belly, heavily, suddenly, sharp, fill out, summon up, fat, full, chubby, plop She plumps up the sofa cushion.她把沙发垫子拍得鼓鼓的。
n. 抢夺；战利品；掠夺品 vt. 掠夺；抢劫；侵吞 vi. 掠夺；盗窃 同义词:prize, capture, harry, despoil, prey upon, pillage They plundered all the valuable things they could find.他们抢劫的所有能找到的值钱东西。
adj. 气动的；充气的；有气胎的 n. 气胎 同义词:air-actuated, aerated Food will be served hot or cold to private houses in pneumatic tubes or automobile wagons.热食或冷食将透过气动管或外送汽车送到私人住宅。
