n. 流行音乐；汽水；砰然声；枪击 vi. 突然出现；爆开；射击；瞪大；发出爆裂声 vt. 取出；开枪打；抛出；突然伸出；突然行动 adj. 流行的；通俗的；热门的 adv. 突然；砰地 abbr. 邮局协议（post office protocol） 同义词:world music, fizzwater, crop up, break out in, extract, take of, popular, fashionable, going, ruling, epidemic, short, amain The champagne cork popped when he pulled it out.他拔香槟酒的瓶塞时它砰的一声开了。
n. 教皇，罗马教皇；权威，大师 同义词:authority, artist On his arrival , the pontiff circled the parked stadium pope mobile.当他到达的时候，这位教皇坐在教皇专车里环绕体育场。

adj. 积极的；[数] 正的，[化学][医] 阳性的；确定的，肯定的；实际的，真实的；绝对的 n. 正数；[摄] 正片 同义词:active, established, practical, actual, fixed, effective, sincere I choose the positive side of life .我选择了指出生活积极的一面。
adv. 肯定地；明确地；断然地 同义词:specifically, definitely, particularly, flat, emphatically Alpha particles positively charged helium nuclei obtained from natural radioactive decay .粒子是从天然放射性蜕变得到的带正电的氦核。

adj. 主要的；卓越的；支配的；有力的；有影响的 同义词:remarkable, excellent, primary, major, prominent It is the land which makes predominant contribution .土地为我们作出了最显著的贡献。
adj. 怀孕的；富有意义的 同义词:cyetic, childing And not just help children survive and grow , he says , but even to support the diets of pregnant women .他说，这不仅可以帮助儿童生存和生长，甚至可以供应妊娠妇女的饮食。

n. 描述，陈述；介绍；赠送 同义词:description, statement, representation, characterization They are varied in style , taste and presentation .在风格、味道和样式上都是不同的。
n. 保存，保留 同义词:conservation, hold, retention, reservation The water and soil preservation project was set up in 1989 .其中的水土保护项目是1989年开始启动的。
vt. 事先调整；事先装置 n. 预调装置 adj. 预先装置的；预先调整的 He preset the video recorder at the desired time.他按要求的时间预先把录像机调好。
vi. 主持，担任会议主席 vt. 管理 同义词:to chair, run the show, manage, conduct, run, direct, control The Prime Minister presides at meetings of the Cabinet.首相主持内阁会议。

n. 威望，声望；声誉 同义词:reputation, credit But fighting in Afghanistan is not just about prestige .但是在阿富汗作战不仅仅是威望的问题。
adv. 大概；推测起来；可假定 同义词:probably, possibly, maybe Some of these Hmong have since fled from the village , presumably for the border .这些苗族人有些逃离村子，后来大概到了边境地区生活。
vt. 假定；推测；擅自；意味着 vi. 相信；擅自行为 同义词:guess, spell, depend, be satisfied of I won't presume to disturb you.我不敢打扰你。
adj. 流行的；普遍的，广传的 同义词:popular, widespread, universal, fashionable, going But courses about how to do it better are less prevalent .但有关如何改善实践的课程，却不是那么常见。
n. 预防；阻止；妨碍 同义词:intervention, violation, check Education would be the best and final prevention against social evils .教育是防止社会罪恶的最好和最终的方法。
vi. 捕食；掠夺；折磨 n. 捕食；牺牲者；被捕食的动物 同义词:grind down, lie on, victim, predation The villagers were preyed on by bandits from the hills.村民们受到山里强盗的抢劫。
vt. 刺，戳；刺伤，刺痛；竖起 n. 刺，扎；刺痛，刺伤；阴茎；锥 vi. 刺；竖起 adj. 竖起的 同义词:cut, pink, smart, thorn, stick up, run through, cocked The child pricked the balloon and it burst.那孩子在气球上刺了个洞，气球就爆了。
adj. 原始的，远古的；简单的，粗糙的 n. 原始人 同义词:original, simple, crude, plain, rough, Euroman This epic extolled the founder of this primitive tribe .这部史诗歌颂了这个原始部落的创始人。
adv. 主要地；大部分 同义词:largely, basically, mainly, mostly, primarily The supply of carbon credits comes principally from two sources .碳信用的供给主要有两个来源。
n. [计] 打印机；印刷工；印花工 同义词:machineman, typothetae The following options allow you to select the destination printer and its connection .下面的选项使您得以选择目标打印机及其连接。
n. 优先；优先权；[数] 优先次序；优先考虑的事 同义词:precedence, preference to sth The priority is protecting the police and the public from their attacks .当前的第一要务是保护警方和民众免受其伤害。

adj. 能生产的；生产的，生产性的；多产的；富有成效的 同义词:fruitful, procreative It might also be one of the most productive .这也可能成为最有生产力的会议。

n. 精通，熟练 同义词:proficient in, conversancy In 2004 only one in five teachers passed the English - proficiency test .2004年，只有五分之一的教师通过了英语水平测试。
adj. 熟练的，精通的 n. 精通；专家，能手 同义词:experienced, skilled, accomplished, perfect, clever, expert, specialist Mr. Barret is not proficient in diagnosis , let alone investigation .巴瑞特先生不擅长诊断，更不必提研究方面。
adj. 有利可图的；赚钱的；有益的 同义词:beneficial, helpful, useful, advantageous, conducive They shared out a profitable domestic market and gave up competing on price .它们共享一个利润丰厚的国内市场，并摒弃价格竞争。
adj. 深厚的；意义深远的；渊博的 同义词:encyclopedic, cyclopaedic This would be a profound tragedy , far more grievous than the tragedy of Vietnam itself .这当然会是一个深刻的悲剧，远比越南悲剧本身更加令人发愁。

n. 禁止；禁令；禁酒；诉讼中止令 同义词:ban, inhibition Use of the drug has not declined since its prohibition .自从禁用该药以来，该药的使用并未减少。

vt. 延长；拖延 同义词:drag on, drag out They prolonged their visit by two days.他们延长访问二天。
n. 提升，[劳经] 晋升；推销，促销；促进；发扬，振兴 同义词:advancement, acceleration, impetus We figure you would want to celebrate your promotion .我们以为你会想要庆祝自己升职呢。
adv. 迅速地；立即地；敏捷地 同义词:quickly, rapidly, fast, ready What prompted her to be so generous?是什么原因使得她如此大方呢?

n. 传播；繁殖；增殖 同义词:circulation, breeding, diffusion, spread, reproduction Scares that thrive, such as the millennium bug and swine flu , have commercial interests that benefit from their propagation .对千年虫和猪流感等传播甚广的恐慌来说，有商业利益集团从恐慌传播中受益。

n. [航][船] 螺旋桨；推进器 同义词:airscrew, airfoil The driving power enters the differential through the drive pinion on the end of the propeller shaft .也就是说，驱动力是从传动轴末端的传动齿轮输送到差速器的。

adj. 适当的；本身的；特有的；正派的 adv. 完全地 同义词:suitable, appropriate, adequate, typical, becoming, totally, entirely, completely, absolutely, thoroughly, strictly, fully Proper weight alone doesn't show whether a diet is lacking in vitamins and minerals .仅仅适当的体重并不能说明饮食中是否缺乏维生素和矿物质。
n. 预言；预言书；预言能力 同义词:prediction, message The teacher prophecy that the boy would become a great national leader was later fulfilled .教员当时曾预言这孩子将来会成为一个伟大的国家领导人。这个预言后来果然应验了。
n. 先知；预言者；提倡者 同义词:advocate, farseer He was considered a seer and a prophet .他被看成一个先知和预言家。

n. 推进；推进力 同义词:drive, pulsion But magnetic propulsion has some drawbacks .但是磁力推进有一些缺陷。

n. [物] 质子 同义词:merron, uron For example , in nuclear physics one takes the mass , charge and spin of the proton as inputs .举个例子，在原子核物理中，质子的质量、电荷、自旋就得当成预设的参数。
n. 原型；标准，模范 同义词:criterion, standard, level, norms, type The company showed the prototype of the new model at the exhibition .公司在展览会上展示了这种新模型的原型。
n. 谚语，格言；众所周知的人或事 同义词:saying, saw The proverb means a balanced education is needed to produce creative people .这句谚语的意思是需要用均衡的教育来培养创造性的人。
n. 省；领域；职权 同义词:domain, territory, world, universe, kingdom KUNMING , the capital of province , is an affluent city .云南省省会昆明是一个富裕的城市。

vt. 喷出，张开；使膨胀；夸张；使骄傲自满 vi. 膨胀；张开；鼓吹；夸张 n. 粉扑；泡芙；蓬松；一阵喷烟；肿块；吹嘘，宣传广告 同义词:expand, belch out, fill, swell with, tumor, knub A fresh breeze puffed across the lake.凉爽的微风一阵阵吹过湖面。
n. 滑轮；皮带轮；滑车 vt. 用滑轮升起 同义词:tackle-block, trochlea The individual strands of each cable were hung in pulley blocks .每根钢索的单股钢丝束悬挂在滑车组上。

n. 睡衣；宽长裤 同义词:pajama, pj's Dick Moore , Elkhart 's mayor , has been so enthusiastic about federal support that some county officials harrumph that he sleeps in Obama pyjamas .埃尔克哈特市市长迪克。摩尔因对联邦政府的援助过于热情的做法而被一些县政府官员指责他“跟奥巴马穿同一件睡衣”。

n. 资格；条件；限制；赋予资格 同义词:membership, limitation, capacity, condition, restriction Far better to add economics to the core curriculum in every school and make it a qualification for any who would dare to embark on the profession of government.更好的方法是把经济学作为每所学校的核心课程来教授，并且对于任何胆敢从政的人来说，这应该作为一个基本的资格。
vt. 限制；使具有资格；证明…合格 vi. 取得资格，有资格 同义词:block, set a limit to, be in a position, be qualified to His skills qualify him for the work.他的技能使他能担当这项工作。
adj. 定性的；质的，性质上的 The quantitative change has begun to make a qualitative difference .数量上的变化正带来质量上的变化。
vt. 量化；为…定量；确定数量 vi. 量化；定量 to quantify the risks of exposure to this kind of asbestos测量接触这种石棉的危险度
adj. 定量的；量的，数量的 同义词:mensurable Another set of misconceptions involves the quantitative description of expansion .另一类误解牵涉到对于膨胀的定量叙述。
adj. 季度的，按季度的；一年四次的 adv. 按季度，[农] 一季一次地；纵横四分地 n. 季刊 This journal is bimonthly , and that one quarterly .这本杂志是双月刊，那本是季刊。
n. 石英 同义词:crystalline silica To this class of substance belong mica , porcelain , quartz , glass , wood , etc .属于这类物质的有云母、瓷器、石英、玻璃、木材等等。
vt. 熄灭，[机] 淬火；解渴；结束；冷浸 vi. 熄灭；平息 同义词:conclude, go out, die, cool, go out He quenched the fire with water.他用水将火扑灭。
n. 追求；寻找 vi. 追求；寻找 vt. 探索 同义词:pursuit, looking for, pursue / pursuit, go after, explore, search after Our hunting dogs are questing for small wild animals in the woods.我们的猎狗正在树林中搜寻小的野兽。
n. 问题，疑问；询问；疑问句 vt. 询问；怀疑；审问 vi. 询问；怀疑；审问 同义词:issue, doubt, query, dispute, wonder, query, wonder, query She was questioned by her mother.她受到母亲的盘问。

adj. 可疑的；有问题的 同义词:suspicious, doubtful Arguments used in its favour – " market completion " and the ability to extend credit more widely – look highly questionable .支持资产证券化的论点——“市场完善”和更广泛放贷的能力——看起来非常值得怀疑。
n. 问卷；调查表 Would you please to do us a favor to resend this questionnaire to your friends , your cooperation will be appreciated.最后还有一个小小的请求：请把这问卷转发给你的朋友。
n. 颤抖；箭袋；震动 vi. 颤抖；振动 vt. 使…颤动；抖动 同义词:shock, flesh-creep, quake, judder, thrill He quivered all over with rage.他气得浑身发抖。

adj. 半径的；放射状的；光线的；光线状的 n. 射线，光线 同义词:actinomorphic, ray, stream The enhancement in vaporization rate evidently depends on the radial location of the vapour decomposition flame zone .汽化率的增加显然取决于蒸汽分解火焰区的径向位置。
adj. 辐射的；容光焕发的；光芒四射的 n. 光点；发光的物体 同义词:roseate, pearlescent, bright spot, luminescent spot His future radiant , and this day was the needle's eye of his destiny .他的前途光明灿烂，这一天正是他命运中的关键时刻。
n. 散热器；暖气片；辐射体 同义词:heatsink, heating unit Indeed, that gigantic schnoz turns out to be a radiator the rain forest dweller uses to lose body heat .不假，那个巨大的嘴原来是这个雨林栖息着用来散发体温的”散热器“。

adj. 激进的；根本的；彻底的 n. 基础；激进分子；[物化] 原子团；[数] 根数 同义词:thorough, organic, fundamental, ultimate, complete, elements, basis, foundation, base, bed Fourth , it is time for radical reform of finance .第四，是时候对金融业进行彻底改革了。
n. 半径，半径范围；[解剖] 桡骨；辐射光线；有效航程 同义词:semidiameter Analysis the reasons and methods of radius compensation in round turning tool .分析了数控车床中圆头车刀刀具半径补偿的原因及方法。
vt. 提高；筹集；养育；升起 vi. 上升 n. 高地；上升；加薪 同义词:enhance, mother, foster, breed, arise, go up, climb, height, rise, altitude, elevation, upgrade She raised her head and went out without a word.她什么也没说，扬起头来走了出去。
n. 葡萄干 同义词:rasin I 'd like to buy some raisin cookies , please.我要买些葡萄干夹心点心。

vi. 团结；重整；恢复；（网球等）连续对打 vt. 团结；集合；恢复健康、力量等 n. 集会；回复；公路赛车会 同义词:league, restore, assemble, fall in, assembly, feedback, meet, gathering, congregation The company commander rallied his defeated and dispersed troops.连长把他的打了败仗的溃散部队重新召集起来。
n. 漫步；漫游；随笔 vt. 漫步于… vi. 漫步；漫游；闲逛；漫谈；蔓延 同义词:essay, travel, range, wander off He rambled in the park every morning.他每天早晨在公园中遛弯儿。
n. 大农场；大牧场 vi. 经营牧场；在牧场工作 vt. 经营牧场；在牧场饲养… 同义词:estancia, plantation He ranched animals on a farm.他在农场饲养牲口。

adj. [数] 随机的；任意的；胡乱的 n. 随意 adv. 胡乱地 同义词:stochastic, arbitrary, ad libitum, wild The system input in this case is turbulent air which produces random pitching motion of the vehicle .在此情况下，系统的输入是紊流大气，它使飞行器产生随机俯仰运动。

n. 范围；幅度；排；山脉 vi. 平行，列为一行；延伸；漫游；射程达到 vt. 漫游；放牧；使并列；归类于；来回走动 同义词:extent, boundary, region, scope, spectrum, territory, area, reach, parallel with, feed, grass The salesclerks ranged the goods in good order in the shop-windows.售货员将橱窗中的商品排列得很整齐。
vt. 抢走；轻敲；敲击致使；使着迷 vi. 敲击；交谈 n. 轻敲 同义词:tap, reave, strike, knock on, bob, peening They rapped the door, but there was no answer .他们敲了敲门，但没人答应。
n. 迅速，急速；速度；险峻 同义词:velocity, rate, speed Her character ripened and developed with frightfully rapidity .她的性格以可怕的速度成熟着、发展着。
n. 兴高采烈 vt. 使…狂喜 同义词:elation, gaiety It passed and he was left with troubled joy , and echo of rapture .它转眼就消失了，剩下的只是几分不安的喜悦，一丝心醉神迷的回味。
n. 流氓，无赖；淘气鬼，捣蛋鬼 adj. 不诚实的；下贱的，卑鄙的 同义词:cad, hoodlum, poor, mean, base, dirty, dishonest He says it's something like a rascal .他说那样看起来像流氓。
adj. 轻率的；鲁莽的；不顾后果的 n. [皮肤] 皮疹；突然大量出现的事物 同义词:hasty, imprudent, quat, tetter It can be equally rash to lie down and try to appease it .但立刻躺下与试图平息灰熊的怒火也同样是轻率之举。

n. 比率，率；速度；价格；等级 vt. 认为；估价；责骂 vi. 责骂；被评价 同义词:degree, classification, coefficient, price, value, assess, count, find, guess, feel, hop on, tell someone off We rated his fortune at about one hundred thousand dollars.我们估计他的财产约值十万美元。
adj. 合理的；理性的 n. 有理数 同义词:reasonable, logical, possible, just, legitimate In the jargon , they have " rational expectations ".用行话来说，他们具备“理性预期”。
vt. 使发出咯咯声；喋喋不休；使慌乱，使惊慌 vi. 喋喋不休地讲话；发出卡嗒卡嗒声 n. 喋喋不休的人；吓吱声，格格声 同义词:harp on, go on about sth, jay, chatterer The wind blew hard.The doors and windows rattled all night.狂风大作。门窗丁零当啷地响了一夜。
n. [化工] 反应器；[核] 反应堆；起反应的人 Inside the reactor the large molecules are cracked into smaller molecules .在反应堆内部大的分子被裂解为较小的分子。
adj. 现实的；现实主义的；逼真的；实在论的 同义词:living, breathing The fall in prices has brought valuations back to more realistic levels .股价下跌使得市场估值回到了更为现实的水平。
n. 实现；领悟 同义词:implementation, completion They realization of the forces at work in Latin American today .他们对今天在拉丁美洲起作用的各种力量一无所知。
vt. 培养；树立；栽种 vi. 暴跳；高耸 adv. 向后；在后面 adj. 后方的；后面的；背面的 n. 后面；屁股；后方部队 同义词:cultivate, foster, plant, set, bed, rise, tower, fro, aback, latter, back, back, behind, ass The rabbit reared its ears.兔子竖起它的耳朵。

n. 理由；理性；动机 vi. 推论；劝说 vt. 说服；推论；辩论 同义词:motivation, excuse, incentive, sake, account, ratiocinate, prevail with, discuss, debate, satisfy, convince, argue Animals do not have the ability to reason.禽兽没有思维能力。
vt. 指责，非难；制止；使相形见绌 n. 非难，指责；谴责，鞭策 同义词:charge, restrain, reprehension, impugnment The manager rebuked the salesgirl sharply for being rude to customers.经理严厉斥责女售货员的对顾客无礼。

n. 接收器；接受者；收信机；收款员，接待者 同义词:taker, acceptor The challenge modern cryptographers face is for sender and receiver to share a key while ensuring that no one has filched a copy.现代的密码专家所遇到的挑战是，如何让发送者与接收者共同拥有一把钥匙，并保证不会外流。
n. 食谱；[临床] 处方；秘诀 同义词:secret, tips As day follows night , this is a recipe for the next crisis .就像黑夜过后是白天，这种疗法也将导致下一场危机。
adj. 互惠的；相互的；倒数的，彼此相反的 n. [数] 倒数；互相起作用的事物 同义词:mutual, au pair That is because the second parameter is actually the reciprocal of the first.那是因为第二个参数值实际上与第一个参数值是可以互换的。
adj. 鲁莽的，不顾后果的；粗心大意的 同义词:indiscretionary, temerarious Most southern towns have suffered from the reckless depredation of the armed gang .大多数南方城镇都遭受过这帮武装匪徒的鲁蛮掠夺。
vt. 测算，估计；认为；计算 vi. 估计；计算；猜想，料想 同义词:expect, feel, find, cast, make, estimate, believe, imagine, cast Did you reckon in the time needed for unloading the cargo?你把卸货所需的时间计算进去了吗?

vt. 开拓；回收再利用；改造某人，使某人悔改 vi. 抗议，喊叫 n. 改造，感化；再生胶 同义词:exploit, carve out, protest against sth, exclaim at, reconstruction, influence New China has reclaimed many men from a life of crime.新中国把许多人从犯罪的道路上挽救了回来。
n. 识别；承认，认出；重视；赞誉；公认 同义词:identification, discernment Recognition of the interesting targets is the key technology of precise guide weapon system .典型目标的检测识别是精确制导武器的关键技术之一。
n. 推荐；建议；推荐信 同义词:suggestion, advice, proposal, instance Word of mouth is the most persuasive form of recommendation .口碑是一种最有说服力的推荐形式。
vt. 使一致；使和解；调停，调解；使顺从 同义词:accord, unify They were reconciled after a quarrel.他们吵架之后又重归于好。
n. 娱乐；消遣；休养 同义词:entertainment, pleasure, sport, occupation, amusement My only recreation has been watching TV .我惟一的娱乐就是看电视。
n. 矩形；长方形 同义词:orthogon Make a rectangle with your fingers like this .像这样用手指做个长方形的形状。
vt. 改正；精馏；整流 同义词:correct, straighten up You should rectify your error before it is too late.你应当及时改正你的错误。

n. [作物] 芦苇；簧片；牧笛；不可依靠的人 vt. 用芦苇盖；用芦苇装饰 同义词:Phragmites, phragmites communis One day , as punishment for a bit of childish willfulness , she puts Jane into the room in which Mr. Reed died .一天，作为对简一丁点儿孩子气任性的惩罚，里德太太把她关进了里德先生病故的那个房间。
n. 暗礁；[地质] 矿脉；收帆 vt. 收帆；缩帆 vi. 缩帆；收帆 同义词:covers, rock to reef in one's umbrella把撑开的雨伞收拢
vi. 卷；眩晕；蹒跚地走；退缩 vt. 卷；使旋转 n. 蹒跚；眩晕；旋转 同义词:roll, swim, roll, turn, revolution, rotation, rolling, turning He reeled back when the heavy blow landed on his head.他的头受此重重一击，使他向后打了个趔趄。
n. 裁判员；调解人；介绍人 vi. 仲裁；担任裁判 vt. 为…当裁判；调停 同义词:judge, pacifier, go between, reconcile He refereed a basketball game yesterday.他昨天为一场篮球赛作裁判。
n. 参考，参照；涉及，提及；参考书目；介绍信；证明书 vi. 引用 vt. 引用 同义词:involved in, mention, quote, cite Each chapter is referenced in minute detail.每一章后面都附有极为详尽的参考资料。
n. 精炼厂；提炼厂；冶炼厂 同义词:smeltery, metallurgical plant The government has delayed approvals of new alumina refinery projects .政府延迟批准建立新的氧化铝精炼厂计划。
vi. 节制，克制；避免；制止 n. 叠句，副歌；重复 同义词:deny oneself, forbear from, repeat, iteration It is difficult for us to refrain from laughing when we are seeing a comedy.在我们观看喜剧时，很难忍住不笑。
n. 点心；起提神作用的东西；精力恢复 同义词:dimsum, mug-up The spectators dropped off to get refreshment .旁观者纷纷离座去吃点心。
n. 难民，避难者；流亡者，逃亡者 同义词:asylee, displaced persons Secondly , the refugee relief consisted of spirit and material condition .其次，对难民进行了精神和物质全面的救济。
adj. 再生的，更生的；更新的 同义词:new, reproductive, updated, reborn Somatic cells of angiosperms enter a regenerative phase and behave like embryos .被子植物体细胞进入一个生殖阶段，而且其行为象胚。
n. 政权，政体；社会制度；管理体制 同义词:government, power An " axis of evil " branded ripe for " regime change ".“邪恶轴心”“政权更迭”的时机已经成熟。
vt. 把…编成团；严格地管制 n. 团；大量 同义词:lots of, wealth, ocean, sea, mass The students were regimented into large groups for military training.学生们被编成大组进行军事训练。
n. 规则性；整齐；正规；匀称 同义词:balance, symmetry So these countries are turning to the US with more regularity .因此，这些国家正越来越频繁地转向美国。
vt. 调节，规定；控制；校准；有系统的管理 同义词:possess, define, contain, manage, state We must try our best to regulate our expenditure.我们必须尽力控制开支。

n. 管理；规则；校准 adj. 规定的；平常的 同义词:governance, administration, management, supervision, control, specified, stated, usual, prescribed, ordinary As in mature markets , regulation plays a big role .与成熟市场一样，制度发挥着重大作用。
vi. 统治；支配；盛行；君临 n. 统治；统治时期；支配 同义词:predominate over, to rule, governance, disposal, rule, dominance The Queen of Britain reigns, but she does not rule or govern.英国女王是国家元首，但不治国事。
vt. 拒绝；排斥；抵制；丢弃 n. 被弃之物或人；次品 同义词:refuse, negative, inferior, degraded product I rejected his suggestion.我不同意他的建议。
vi. 转播；接替 n. [电] 继电器；接替，接替人员；驿马 vt. 转播；使接替；分程传递 同义词:take sth over, realy, supersedure, retransmit In ancient times the messages were relayed from one place to another.古时候信息是用接力的方式从一地传送到另一地。
n. 宗教；宗教信仰 同义词:deen, religious belief Religion is not the only source of division .宗教问题并不是分裂的唯一来源。

n. [数] 余数，残余；剩余物；其余的人 adj. 剩余的；吃剩的 vt. 廉价出售；削价出售 vi. 廉价出售；削价出售 同义词:leaving, arithmetical compliment, surplus, residual, odd, bargain sale, undercut, bargain sale The unsalable books are to be remaindered next week.滞销书将于下周削价出售。
vi. 偿还；报答；报复 vt. 回报；报复；付还 同义词:return, make the payments, get back on, get even with When will you repay me the $500 I lent you last week?我上周借给你的五百美元你什么时候还给我?
vt. 废除；撤销；废止；放弃；否定 n. 废除；撤销 同义词:yield, desert, negative, abolish, abolition, destoolment He believes that death penalty will be repealed sooner or later.他相信死刑早晚会被废除。
vt. 击退；抵制；使厌恶；使不愉快 同义词:refuse, roll back We repelled the enemy from the shores after a long hard struggle.经过长时间的艰苦战斗，我们将敌人从海岸击退。
vt. 取代，代替；替换，更换；归还，偿还；把…放回原处 同义词:restore, return, shift, tender Please replace the books after reading.看完书后请将书放回原处。

n. 更换；复位；代替者；补充兵员 同义词:restoration, substitute First rejecting negotiations , US finally agreed to a compromise : a two -year plan to develop a replacement for the 1997 Kyoto Protocol .在最先拒绝谈判之后，美国最终同意让步：发展一份可以替代1997年京都议定书的两年计划。

n. 报告；报道；成绩单 vt. 报告；报导；使报到 vi. 报告；报到；写报导 同义词:advisory, rept, cover, give notice to, message, inform of If there is something wrong with the machine,it should be reported at once to the engineer in charge.机器出了毛病，应立即报告主管工程师。
n. 代表；表现；表示法；陈述 同义词:presentation, statement, deputy, behalf of, ambassador Our firm has adequate representation in Europe .本公司在欧洲有足够的代理权。
adj. 典型的，有代表性的；代议制的 n. 代表；典型；众议员 同义词:typical, characteristic, deputy, model, behalf of, ambassador I was a field representative for five years for a large commercial school .我曾经在家大型的商贸学校担任过五年的区域代表。
vt. 复制；再生；生殖；使…在脑海中重现 vi. 复制；繁殖 同义词:generate, repeat, breed, increase The computer reproduced the data as a set of diagrams.计算机用一组图表把那些数据重新显示出来。

n. 繁殖，生殖；复制；复制品 同义词:generation, breeding, propagation, get As a father of six , he might have added something about women 's role in the reproduction of the species .作为六个孩子的父亲，他也许还对女人在人类繁衍中起的作用说了些别的什么。
adj. 爬虫类的；卑鄙的 n. 爬行动物；卑鄙的人 同义词:poor, mean, base, dirty, insect, ratfink Rise , and don't degrade youself into an abject reptile .起来，可别把你自己贬成一个下贱的爬虫。
adj. 必备的，必不可少的；需要的 n. 必需品 同义词:needed, necessity, want Mobs breed a requisite measure of complexity for emergent entities.群体产生出一种衡量突现事物复杂性的需求。

n. 相似；相似之处；相似物；肖像 同义词:image, conformity, likeness It is always going to be an approximate picture but he insists there is a " strong resemblance " with what happens in reality .这永远只会是一种大致的描述，但他坚称这与实际情况“非常相似”。
vt. 怨恨；愤恨；厌恶 同义词:hate, be down on His father seems to resent my being here.我呆在这里他的父亲似乎不大高兴。
n. 预约，预订；保留 同义词:preservation, booking, hold, retention I want to confirm my flight reservation .我要确定我预约的班机。
n. 储备，储存；自然保护区；预备队；[金融] 储备金 vt. 储备；保留；预约 vi. 预订 同义词:store, repertory, stay at, save from, book for, make reservation You must reserve your strength for the tennis final.你必须为网球决赛保存力量。
vt. 住，居住；属于 同义词:occupy, belong to Her family has resided in New York for more than ten years.她家住在纽约已十余年了。

adj. 居住的；住院医师；定居的 n. 居民 同义词:stationary, liver, dweller, inhabitant As Secretary of Defense Robert Gates has noted , the United States is not a visiting power in Asia , but a resident power .正如国防部长罗伯特∙盖茨指出，美国在亚洲不是一个来去匆匆的大国，而是一个长驻大国。

n. 剩余；残渣 adj. 剩余的；残留的 同义词:surplus, spare, remaining, surplus, odd In the end , no one could tell whether an experimental result was caused by those residual movements or the superimposed microsaccades .到后来，没有人能确定那些实验结果是由残留的眼球运动，还是由补加回去的微颤动所造成。
vt. 辞职；放弃；委托；使听从 vi. 辞职 n. 辞去职务 同义词:yield, desert, refer, quit, step down, quit to resign one's hope放弃希望
n. 辞职；放弃；辞职书；顺从 同义词:compliance, demission His resignation was choreographed , and he was swiftly re- elected as party chairman .他的辞职是被编排过的，并且他很快被重新选为党主席。

adj. 坚决的；果断的 同义词:determined, decided This united front is so solid that it possesses the resolute will and the inexhaustible capacity to defeat every enemy and overcome every difficulty .这个统一战线是如此巩固，它具备了战胜任何敌人和克服任何困难的坚强的意志和源源不竭的能力。
adj. 值得尊敬的；人格高尚的；相当数量的 n. 可敬的人 同义词:venerable, honourable We often read in novels how a seemingly respectable person or family has some terrible secret .在小说中，我们经常读到一个表面上受人尊重的人物或家庭，却有着骇人听闻的秘密。
n. 响应；反应；回答 同义词:reaction, behavior, reception, reply, answer There is the gradual stirring in response to the warming pink glow of sunlight on the eyelids .一种是轻缓渐进的扰动，它能对粉红色温暖的阳光照在眼皮上有所反应；
adj. 负责的，可靠的；有责任的 同义词:honest, reliable, tried, safe, sure Kids make a responsible and mature and help us to understand life better .孩子让人有责任心，变得成熟，并且帮助我们更好的理解人生。
vt. 抑制，控制；约束；制止 同义词:possess, regulate, contain, manage, bottle She was so angry that she could hardly restrain herself.她气得几乎控制不了自己。
n. 合力；结果；[化学] 生成物 adj. 结果的；合成的 同义词:outcome, product, event, consequence, harvest, complex, synthetic This determinant is a special case of the resultant of two polynomials.这个行列式是两个行列式的结式的特殊情形。
n. [管理] 履历；个人简历；摘要 vt. 重新开始；重新获得 vi. 再开始 同义词:bio, abstract, brief, summary, record, recover, start over Will you please resume your seat?请您重新坐下，好吗?
vt. 零售；转述 vi. 零售 n. 零售 adv. 以零售方式 adj. 零售的 同义词:sell-through, resale This kind of chocolate is retailed at one pound a kilo.这种巧克力糖零售每公斤一英镑。
vt. 延迟；阻止；妨碍；使减速 vi. 减慢；受到阻滞 n. 延迟；阻止 同义词:dispute, let, stem, block, prevention, check, detention Shortage of labour power retarded our economic development.缺乏劳动力使我们的经济发展速度减慢。
n. 退休，退役 同义词:superannuation Yet many are well past normal retirement age .然而，许多人都过了正常退休年龄。
n. 反驳，顶嘴；曲颈瓶 vt. 反驳，反击 vi. 反驳，回嘴 同义词:contradiction, oppugnation, refute, disprove, talk back, answer sb. back He retorted that I was to blame.他反驳说这事全赖我。
vt. 显示；透露；揭露；泄露 n. 揭露；暴露；门侧，窗侧 同义词:make clear, prove, disclose, expose, uncovery, exposure to sth I should be glad to give you any help if you reveal your thoughts to me.如果你把你的想法透露给我，我愿意尽全力帮助你。
n. 税收，国家的收入；收益 同义词:taxes, income, proceeds, yield Being the company 's main source of revenue , critics say , it is hardly a model of openness and transparency .批评者说，作为公司的主要收入来源，它很难被视为一个公开和透明度的模型。

n. 背面；相反；倒退；失败 vt. 颠倒；倒转 adj. 反面的；颠倒的；[篮球]反身的 vi. 倒退；[桥牌]逆叫 同义词:failure, loss, contrary, losing, defeat, bottom up, head over heels, upside-down, perversive, retrogress, step backward Please reverse your examination paper.请把试卷翻过来。
vi. 复兴；复活；苏醒；恢复精神 vt. 使复兴；使苏醒；回想起；重演，重播 同义词:come back to life again, resurge, recall, reinvigorate A dead man will never revive.死人将永不复生。

n. 罗马人；古罗马语 adj. 罗马的；罗马人的 Mercury was the name of the messenger of the ancient Roman gods .水星（墨丘利）是古代罗马神话中众神使者的名字。

adj. 浪漫的；多情的；空想的 n. 浪漫的人 vt. 使…浪漫化 同义词:fantastic, amorous Gray and Burns were precursors of the Romantic movement in English Literature .格雷和伯恩斯是英国文学浪漫主义运动的先驱。
n. 公鸡；狂妄自负的人 同义词:coq, chanticleer A donkey heard a rooster crow in the field .驴子听见公鸡在田地里啼叫。
vi. 旋转；循环 vt. 使旋转；使转动；使轮流 adj. [植] 辐状的 同义词:wheel, circle, spin, turn, spin, swing The moon rotates around the earth.月球围绕着地球旋转。

n. [计] 程序；日常工作；例行公事 adj. 日常的；例行的 同义词:procedure, program, daily, everyday, household Our Insurance Manager handles most of it , and his secretary looks after the routine and clerical work .大部分由保险经理处理，日常事务和文书工作由他的秘书去做。
n. 行，排；划船；街道；吵闹 vt. 划船；使……成排 vi. 划船；争吵 同义词:hong, range, line, rank, sound, boat, lock horns Can you row a boat?你会划船吗?

vi. 统治；管辖；裁定 n. 统治；规则 vt. 统治；规定；管理；裁决；支配 同义词:king it over, reign over, governance, regulation, order, define, regulate, manage, state, conduct Hilter ruled Germany for only 12 years.希特勒统治德国仅12年。
adj. 无情的，残忍的 同义词:cruel, relentless Not that the Americans were ruthless , he says .他说，这倒不是美国人不讲人情。

n. 满意，满足；赔偿；乐事；赎罪 同义词:content, fill, satisfied with, Lays They found that people in countries with higher incomes report higher life satisfaction .他们发现收入较高的国家国民对生活满意度较大。

n. [天] 土星；农业之神（罗马神话中的一个形象） Looking for a peaceful seaside vacation spot ? You might want to consider Saturn 's largest moon, Titan.想寻找一个安静的海边度假点么?也许你应该考虑土星最大的卫星。

n. 不足；缺乏 同义词:shortage, short of, deficiency, insufficient, need They do this, first , because the internet , in effect , eliminates scarcity in the medium .他们这么做，首先，是因为互联网，有效地消除了媒介中的缺乏。
adj. 深红的；鲜红色的；罪孽深重的；淫荡的 n. 猩红色；红衣；绯红色；鲜红色布 同义词:immoral, lewd Look your last on the scarlet letter and its wearer !在大庭广众之中与红字的佩戴者讲起话来。

n. 奖学金；学识，学问 同义词:knowledge, wisdom, learning, study, letter Good athletes often get a free education on the scholarship .好的运动员通常可以获得免费的教育奖学金。

adj. 明智的；明显的；意识到的；通晓事理的 n. 可感觉到的东西；敏感的人 同义词:obvious, aware, distinct, wise, visible This is a sensible agenda .这是一项明智的议程。

n. 传感器 同义词:transducer, SEN And the sensor could be used to help people on earth .这种传感器也可以帮助地球上的人们。
n. 感情，情绪；情操；观点；多愁善感 同义词:mood, emotion, viewpoint, affection, heart The Chinese sentiment for rocks has already been explained , or hinted at , in a previous section .关于中国人对石头的感情，我在前一节里已经说明过，或已经暗示过。
n. [数][计] 序列；顺序；续发事件 vt. 按顺序排好 同义词:order, consecutiveness to sequence the names按顺序排列好名单
n. 布道；训诫；启示；冗长的讲话 vt. 对…布道；对…说教 vi. 布道 同义词:mission, message It is no use to sermon me.对我唠叨可没用。
n. 蛇（尤指大蛇或毒蛇）；狡猾的人 同义词:snake, fox I felt the soil creep and heave beneath me , like some monstrous serpent .我觉得大地在我下面起伏蠕动，象一条可怕的巨蟒。

n. 集合；一套；布景；装置 vt. 树立；点燃；点缀； vi. (日,月)落沉；凝固；结果 adj. 固定的；规定的；固执的 同义词:device, apparatus, installation, assembly, tendency, unit, direction, put, fire, rear, light, result, bottom line, specified, stated, fixed, prescribed, regulation to set a magazine on the teapoy把杂志放在茶几上
n. 解决，处理；[会计] 结算；沉降；殖民 同义词:transactions, disposal, resolution, treatment, handling A constitutional settlement — or a prelude to more trouble ?修宪是解决问题还是更多纷争的前奏？
adj. 严峻的；严厉的；剧烈的；苛刻的 同义词:tight, hard, smart, harsh, rigorous Hence the severe shortage of credit and predictions of worse to come .因此更严重的信贷短缺和更坏的预期将会到来。
adj. 破旧的；卑鄙的；吝啬的；低劣的 同义词:poor, mean, tight, base, shot Otherwise , when ignored, he would become uncared shabby .而一个人没人注意，他也就变得灰头土脸，衣冠不整了。
n. 树荫；阴影；阴凉处；遮阳物；（照片等的）明暗度；少量、些微；细微的差别 vt. 使阴暗；使渐变；为…遮阳；使阴郁；掩盖 vi. （颜色、色彩等）渐变 同义词:umbrage, fantom, dull, overshadow, graduate to shade one's eyes with his hand用手遮住眼睛
adj. 朦胧的；有阴影的；虚无的；暗黑的 同义词:hazy, bleary It is shadowy to guess what Hitler would have done .要猜测希特勒会采取什么行动，那就更难令人捉摸了。
adj. 成荫的；阴暗的；名声不好的 同义词:umbriferous, dull Then Tom hid himself away in a shady nook to sleep till noon .然后汤姆就躲到一个阴凉幽静的地方去睡觉，一直睡到中午。
n. 拍杆；轴；箭杆；杆状物 vt. 利用；在……上装杆 to shaft a hammer给锤头安上柄
n. 假装；骗子；赝品 vt. 假装；冒充 vi. 假装；佯装 adj. 假的；虚假的；假装的 同义词:simulation, fraud, acting, sharp, simulate, come, act, fox, affected, assumed, simulate to sham Scotch whisky造假苏格兰威士忌酒

vt. 粉碎；打碎；破坏；破掉；使散开 vi. 粉碎；损坏；落叶 n. 碎片；乱七八糟的状态 同义词:destroy, comminute, size reduction, out of action, debris, chip to shatter something into powder把某物碾成粉末
adj. 绝对的；透明的；峻峭的 adv. 完全；陡峭地 vi. 偏航 vt. 使偏航；使急转向 n. 偏航；透明薄织物 同义词:strict, absolute, transparent, positive, crystal, very, quite a, yaw, crab, yaw, leeway to sheer off someone避开某人

n. 造船；造船业；造船术 同义词:newbuilding But the big question is how China will face up to the deterioration of market conditions threatening in the important shipbuilding nations .但关键问题是，中国将如何应对市场环境恶化给重要造船国带来的威胁。

n. 缺乏，缺少；不足 同义词:poverty, short of, deficiency, need, drought One possible reason : a shortage of school nurses .一个可能的原因是：校园护士的短缺。

n. 虾；小虾；矮小的人 vi. 捕虾 adj. 有虾的；虾制的 同义词:small, crevette, prawn Larger migratory include the shrimp -like krill , animals that resemble small shell -less snails and jellyfish , and other fascinating creatures .大的迁移者有虾状的磷虾，还有无壳的蜗牛和水母等动物，还有一些其他奇怪的生物。

n. 灌木；灌木丛 同义词:bush, frutex Every tree and shrub seems to be in bloom .几乎每棵乔木和灌木都在盛开花朵。

adv. 向侧面地；向一旁 adj. 向侧面的；一旁的 同义词:laterad Sometimes they even push through the gums sideways .有时它们甚至会压迫牙龈侧面。

n. 围攻；包围；围城；不断袭击；长期努力 vt. 围攻；包围 同义词:besiegement, encirclement, invest, case The problem is that the outpouring of global sympathy generated by the siege helps Hamas even more .问题是封锁导致的世界各地人民对加沙的同情实际上对于哈马斯更有利。

adj. 重大的；有效的；有意义的；值得注意的；意味深长的 n. 象征；有意义的事物 同义词:valid, important, available, effective, virtual, remarkable, symbol, indication Even so , the gains from the victory of 1902 were significant indeed .即使如此，从1902年胜利取得的收获的确是重要的。

n. [化学] 硅；硅元素 Silicon , however , is not the best material for sensing light .然而，硅并不是制作光传感器的最佳材料。
n. 类似；相似点 同义词:analogy, kinsmanship What are the causes of this similarity ?请问这个相似性导致的原因是什么？
adj. 简单的；单纯的；天真的 n. 笨蛋；愚蠢的行为；出身低微者 同义词:plain, primitive, turkey, put, idiot, stupid Life was quiet and simple .生活是安静和简单的。
n. 朴素；简易；天真；愚蠢 同义词:homeliness, austerity Out of all the surfaces , the sphere , they knew , had a unique simplicity .他们知道在所有的曲面当中，球的简单性是独一无二的。

n. 真实，诚挚 同义词:reality, true That their theology so perfectly supported their material privileges only strengthened the sincerity with which it was embraced .神学如此完美地支持了他们的物质特权，这只会更加强他们的虔诚。
adj. 单数的；单一的；非凡的；异常的 n. 单数 同义词:remarkable, extraordinary, novel, wonder, exquisite One boy " is singular ; " two boys " is plural .“一个男孩”是单数；“两个男孩”是复数。
vi. 下沉；消沉；渗透 vt. 使下沉；挖掘；使低落 n. 水槽；洗涤槽；污水坑 同义词:dip, to dig, tap into, trough, washing tank Wood does not sink in water.木头在水中不会沉没。
n. 汽笛；迷人的女人；歌声动人的女歌手 adj. 迷人的 vi. 响着警报器行驶 vt. 引诱 同义词:hooter, whistle, killing, taking, engaging, charming, fascinating, induce, seduce The fire trucks sirened by.消防车鸣着警笛开了过去。
n. 起居室；客厅 同义词:living rooms, keeping room Hilda let Andrew in herself , preceding him to a sitting- room .希尔达本人打开门让安德鲁进去，又把他引进一间居室。

vi. 跳跃；跳绳；遗漏；跳读 vt. 跳过；遗漏 n. 跳跃；跳读 同义词:dance, to leap, jump, clear, jump, spring to skip about跳来跳去
n. 摩天楼，超高层大楼；特别高的东西 There are also plans to build a similar , 70 -storey skyscraper in Moscow .另外还出现要在莫斯科建设70层类似摩天楼的计划。

vi. 嗅；嗤之以鼻 vt. 嗅；闻；用力吸；发觉 n. 吸，闻；嗤之以鼻；气味；以鼻吸气；吸气声 同义词:smell, snuff at, smell, nose, discover, suction, smell, wind Blow your nose. Don't sniff!把鼻子擤干净，别呼哧呼哧的!
n. 势利小人，势利眼；假内行 同义词:tuft-hunter This part of the town have a lot of snob appeal .该城的这一区很能吸引自视甚高的人。

adj. 大量的；实质的；内容充实的 n. 本质；重要材料 同义词:massive, extensive, macro, much, volume, essence, entity, principle, texture, interior This generated profit , but any substantial technical innovations required the approval of management and a re -engineering of the entire network .这是有益的，但是任何实质的技术创新都需要管理层的批准，并需要对整个网络进行重构。

adj. 微妙的；精细的；敏感的；狡猾的；稀薄的 同义词:sensitive, delicate, detailed, refined, designing It is also true that these indicators are blunt instruments for describing often subtle attitudes .上述指标在描述这些往往微妙的态度时，不大管用，这也是事实。

n. 继承者；后续的事物 同义词:heres A third is his lack of an obvious successor , or even of much influence over the choice .第三，他后继无人，不甚明朗，虽然他对法国人民未来的选择影响力很大…

adj. 简易的；扼要的 n. 概要，摘要 同义词:condensed, terse, abstract, brief, resume Then , write a quick summary of the conversation and why you are perfect for the job .然后，写一个谈话的快速摘要以及为什么你非常适合这份工作。
n. 顶点；最高级会议；最高阶层 adj. 最高级的；政府首脑的 同义词:height, sky, peak, apex, crown, first-chop, ritzy He kept Stalin company to summit during the World War Ⅱ.第二次世界大战期间他曾陪伴斯大林参加过最高级会谈。
vt. 召唤；召集；鼓起；振作 同义词:stir oneself, nerve oneself He summoned his subordinates hastily to his office.他急忙召唤他的下级去他的办公室商议。
adj. 极好的；华丽的；宏伟的 同义词:wonderful, excellent, famous, grand, great Those states have done a superb job of managing their deer , elk and bear .这些州在管理野鹿、麋鹿和野熊方面做的很好。
adj. 表面的；肤浅的 n. 表面文章；外表；浅薄的人 同义词:surface, external, facial, shallow, person, garment This stance has a superficial logic .这个观点的逻辑是肤浅的。

vt. 支持，支撑，支援；扶持，帮助；赡养，供养 n. 支持，维持；支援，供养；支持者，支撑物 同义词:encourage, facilitate, second, carry, boost, holding, adhesion, backing, advocate to support an old tree with a pole用支杆支撑起一棵古树

adj. 匀称的，对称的 同义词:well-proportioned, meristic This problem can be avoided by using three components which produce a symmetrical path curve .使用三块能产生反对称形路径曲线的元件，即可避免上述问题。

vt. 取笑；戏弄；梳理；欺负；强求；使起毛 n. 戏弄；爱纠缠的小孩；挑逗者；卖弄风骚的女孩 vi. 取笑 同义词:guy, exact, kid, razz, poke fun at, to make fun of He teased Mary with a jest.他说俏皮话逗玛丽。

adj. [力] 拉力的；可伸长的；可拉长的 同义词:extendible, tractile The tensile strength of vagus and spinal nerves is very alike .迷走神经与脊神经的拉伸强度几乎完全相同。

adv. 它的；由此；在其中；关于…；将它 同义词:wherein, among the rest The cityscape and its destruction thereof swims by in a haze of blurry gray , black and white flashes .都市风景和它的破坏关于游泳被在模糊的灰色一片薄雾中，黑白的闪光。

n. 大腿，股 同义词:upper leg A small fish brushed against his thigh , sending a shock like electricity through his body.一条小鱼碰了他的大腿一下，他觉得那鱼像是对他闪电般地一刺。
adj. 彻底的；十分的；周密的 同义词:complete, radical We have asked our service department to have thorough investigation of the complaint .我们已经要求我们的服务部门对该投诉做彻底的调查。
adj. 轻率的；欠考虑的；考虑不周的；不顾及他人的 同义词:hasty, indiscreet He is a thoughtless boy and is always making mistakes .他是个粗心大意的孩子，常常犯错。
vt. 打；使逆行 vi. 打谷；白忙；猛烈摆动 n. 打谷；逆风浪行进；踢水动作 同义词:strike, beat upon, thresh, thresh They are thrashing their wheat.他们正在脱麦粒。

n. 入口；门槛；开始；极限；临界值 同义词:entry, conception, limitation, beginning, opening The gain is now well above the ( lowered ) oscillation threshold .此时，增益大大超过（降低了的）振荡阈值。

adj. 烦人的，无聊的；令人讨厌的 同义词:terrible, boring Why you should expect it through the person of a steamy , devoted , often tiresome Jewess to find this kind of thing ?你为什么希望通过一个浑身冒着热气，忠心耿耿，却常常令人讨厌的犹太女人来发现这种东西？

adv. 普遍地；人人；到处 同义词:generally, everywhere, around, throughout, about To date , none of these proposals has been universally accepted .但迄今为止，没有任何一个提案被普遍采纳。

n. 摔跤；搏斗；斗争 vi. 摔跤；斗争；斟酌 vt. 与摔跤；与…搏斗；使劲搬动 同义词:war, conflict, battle, fight, fight, struggle (with), breast, muscle They are going to wrestle a match next month.他们下月要进行一场摔跤比赛。
adj. 可怜的；卑鄙的；令人苦恼或难受的 同义词:poor, mean, base, dirty Then you condemn me to live wretched and to die accursed ?那么你就是判定我活着受罪，死后要受诅咒了？
vt. 拧；绞；紧握；使痛苦；折磨 vi. 蠕动；扭动；感到痛苦；感到苦恼 n. 拧；绞；挤；扭动 同义词:screw, harry, worry, trouble, tear, squirm, wriggle, twist, tweak to wring a towel dry把毛巾拧干
n. 皱纹 vi. 起皱 vt. 使起皱纹 同义词:rugosity, plication, crease, frounce The wind wrinkled the water with waves.风刮得水面泛起波纹。
n. 施乐（商标名，美国办公设备制造公司）；影印，静电印刷品 vt. 用静电复印法复印 同义词:photoprint To xerox is to make copies of graphic material by a dry photocopying process.静电复印就是用干燥摄影复制法复制图像材料。
vi. 乘游艇，驾游艇 n. 游艇，快艇；轻舟 同义词:speed boat, mosquito craft We often go yachting.我们常常乘快艇游览。
vi. 渴望，向往；思念，想念；怀念；同情，怜悯 同义词:rare, aspire He yearned to ask her to marry him.他一心想着向她求婚。
n. 酵母；泡沫；酵母片；引起骚动因素 同义词:bubble, foam The vacuoles of yeast cells represents persistent organelles .酵母细胞的液泡是永久性的细胞器。
n. 轭；束缚；牛轭 vt. 结合；给…上轭 vi. 结合；匹配 同义词:chain, restriction, couple, become one, link, bond, couple, become one, combine As a farmer, you should learn how to yoke the oxen together.作为农民，你应该学会怎样把一对牛用轭连起来。
n. 蛋黄；[胚] 卵黄；羊毛脂 同义词:vitellus, yelk The cost of a lifetime spent opening eggs incompetently is a small amount of wasted time and some spilled yolk .敲不好鸡蛋的严重后果也就是花点时间收拾一下洒出来的蛋黄而已！
n. 年轻人；少年 同义词:young adult, stripling That youngster is my brother .那个小孩是我的兄弟。
vt. 镀锌于…；涂锌于…；用锌处理 n. 锌 Zinc can also help the body fight lead absorption .锌元素也能帮助人体抵抗铅的吸收。
